My son is coming to town soon, and he states he can set it up as he has one and he purchased mine as a gift.  After I get it set up, I can re-submit a fair review.  I'm sure it will be alright, as many other family members have the Fire stick and they all love it.
Easy to install. It has eliminated problems we were having with the old Fire Box. Thank you for a fine product.
Very Easy to set up and use. Alexa finds everything!Good Product, Good Price, makes streaming a breeze with it!

I’m using this for a TV in the bedroom, there was no cable available, so I got this, it’s fantastic, opens up overwhelming amount of choices for entertainment old and new, couldn’t be happier with this!
I gave this as a gift and it was greatly appreciated. We like the convenience and flexibility’ it offers. Super pleased.
Loads quickly, does everything my regular Firestick does at a great price. (Just use your TV remote for volume)
Great little device to stream content online. Set up was easy. The voice control is a big set up from my Apple TV 3rd gen.
Its great!  Easy to set up and use. I can't imagine life without it it. The best part no more $178.00 cable bills
It took just minutes to install the device. Before long I had several apps working, and the TV in binge-mode. Recommended!
So disappointed, I’ve had multiple Rokus in the past and never had a problem but this would not even set up. Over an hour and it just keeps updating and restarting over and over again
I was getting a lot of crashes (grey screen came up), I thought it was the Roku, but it wasn't.  The problem was my Sony Bravia TV.

This truly does as advertised.  What sold me is that it connects & streams so well even though my WIFI is set up on opposite end of my home.  Got it on sale $20.00 less...should have purchased two, but will watch & get a 2nd one to replace my Roku 2.  Voice activation is really nice to maneuver.  Arrived as promised!
Really like this control and the programs that come with it. The only thing that could be better is to have a backlight on buttons so that they can be seen in low light or dark.

These arrived today. One of the two boxes arrived with a broken seal, the batteries were loose in the box without the cellophane covering, and part of the literature had also been removed from the cellophane. Guess someone returned it before it got to me. Disappointing.

I installed on an 1080p tv and the clarity of this Roku stick is really impressive. The only glitch, if it is a Roku glitch is that Youtube keeps on disconnecting, hence the 4 star rating. Also the remote sometimes does not work. I have to removethe battery and put it back in. It is also very quick

Tried 3 different ROKU units and none of them worked. ROKU customer service is NONEXISTENT, email only because of virus allegedly. Takes 2 days to get an answer to questions with no suggestions or ability to make them work. Finally ordered Firestick - OUTSTANDING
I had to edit my review because as it turns out, the problem is with my modem, not this Roku Stick.This device works as it should. I highly recommend!But it eats batteries, so I remove them at night.

I use a Google home to control lights and the like and was excited to see that the Roku added support for Google Assistant.  There are only a couple of commands and they are not clearly documented.  I say this as someone who has spent the time to learn commands for different devices and platforms.Overall streaming works quite well but the 4K is a little pointless (on both the TV and Streaming Stick).

I have an older Roku that did not work very well on my basement TV, which is the furthest point from my wireless router.  The Roku Streaming Stick + said it has long range wireless connectivity. It was easy to hookup and I was streaming in a few minutes.  Roku delivered.  No more time outs and restarts like I had to do with my older Roku.Shout out to Cosmos TECH, the seller, who worked with me to resolve an issue.

I mostly just bought this so I can watch my Spectrum cable app on my upstairs TV without having to pay for another cable box. It works great and the other apps are just icing on the cake. There's a little buffering at times, but it's a very minor issue.
Other Roku devices have more features but this is one has all that I need. Works like a charm. I've no complaints.Take your time and look for a Roku comparison chart online and pay for what you need.

I have an older Roku that I love. I also had a loved one just using the apps on his smart tv, super slowwwww. Bought him this for Christmas and it is such a vast improvement on response time. Very satisfied with this purchase!

I really like this for streaming all my favorite shows. It is very easy to setup within just a few minutes I was enjoying streaming quality entertainment. Importing my subscriptions were seamless  and easy.

Great wifi range and super easy set up.  I purchased to replace my amazon stick because it did not get good connection to wifi from the living room tv and this roku stick+ has no problems connecting to wifi to allow me to watch all my shows without buffering.  It connected to the tv sound super easy without using any codes and even controls the sound bar we have set up with the TV.  It is so easy to use that even my 75 year old father can work it with ease.  LOVE this product!

I didn't know what to expect with ROKU, only knew I needed it to stream HULU since my 'smart' tv was no longer up to the newest technology.  ROKU was a breeze to install,  easy to follow instructions.  There are so many links to free TV stations with movies and series.  Best purchase that I've made in a while.  Most definitely recommend it.

This product is not as reliable as the old models (one of which I have had for 5 years).  If the wireless connection is interrupted (uh - power blips), it does not connect as easily.  It has a propensity to display "not connected" and "Missing advanced wireless receiver" messages when this happens.  Am keeping it as a back up, but am buying the Roku Ultra.
This works greatbut even though I have a lot of technical knowledge I could not get it to control volume or other controls on my 2011 panasonic 32" Flat tv.So its not doing everything I had hoped.

I got this Because I have an older DVD player with built in apps, they run sooooo slow and are never updated. The Rocku was a perfect cheap solution - runs perfect and super fast, has all the apps I stream from and the interfaces are nice and updated. Yay!

I ordered this after I had moved to Mexico with my older Roku device. I had little TV reception and couldn't stay on Roku due to lousy internet. When I received the Streaming Stick- I was blown away by the difference. Even the TV had a clear picture (which it had not before). Once I did the EASY set up, Netflix and all my channels were immediately available. I could not be more please!!

I gave this 3 stars due to the frustration of activation. Instead of the old method of entering a code you have to provide an email and wait for the link.It took 3 days to get an email. I attached this thing to 3 different SSIDs on two separate routers and nothing. I rebooted, resubmitted, nothing. I finally attempted another activation days later and got the code.Once it was activated the product itself was great but I was in the process of returning this when that final attempt was succesfull. Roku needs to fix their activation method.

I wish I could give this a better review, but it began overheating as soon as I had it up and running. The warning came through on the tv screen as I was enjoying "The Expanse" in amazing 4k on the new Samsung Q80. I was sad to send it back, but I bought the Ultra and with any luck that should be amazing.
Love Roku....the only one that allows us to use both Amazon and Vudu.

So rather than pay monthly for boxes on my additional tv’s I tried this and I am so happy I did! It is so simple to move that in seconds I can move it from one room to another. I use it in the kitchen during the day and my bedroom at night. Set up was very simple. I needed no help. The remote works my tv for on and off and volume as well as the Roku. I only wish it had page up and down so I could scan channels faster. I love it anyway. I believe it is the only stick that works for Comcast, however it works with other providers too.

Roku is probably the most versatile streaming device that is compatible with the highest number of streaming services.  The streaming stick plus is capable of 4k.  It is very easy to connect and set up.  The remote has the capability of controlling your TV so it is the only remote you need.  Purchasing the stick gives you a lifetime subscription to the Roku channel that has interesting movies that change every month.

It works as expected . I have run into issues where the interface freezes. A reboot of the Roku fixes the same. SInce i have bought it have done this couple of times. I have 150MBS download capability and even then i sometimes see the streaming is choppy for a while and then it recovers. I have a Netgear Nighthawk wireless router which within 3 meters of the Roku.

Interface is really slow compared to other streaming devices. Drains batteries in under a week even if you dont use them. Customer support from Roku is abysmal. Look online and you will see many people have the same issue with these 'defective' remotes. 1 month lead time to get it replaced apparently.

I really love this Roku device. It is extremely easy to set up, and the quality is amazing. There isn't much to say about this, but if you are newly moved into an apartment or house, and you need a way to watch TV, you should absolutely purchase this.

I hated having 2 remotes, one for Roku and one to turn the TV off and on and use for volume. This Roku solves that problem. I haven't tried the voice command yet, so no comments on that. Only downside is it doesn't connect to an external soundbar. But perfect for a bedroom if you are tired of multiple remotes. And got a great deal on Prime Day!

I needed a new Roku for the bedroom since we dropped DirecTV and added HULU. This works with Hulu and all the other streaming apps we use (Netflix, Prime). Excellent connection to our Wifi with no dropping on live TV.
I had a hard time setting it up. I needed to have the Linksys password. Once I found the password, it worked.
Voice interaction good quality great signal over some distance works like a charm do wish there was a power button though
Me encanto... Facil de instalar, imagen de excelente calidad y con un control sencillo y fácil de usar... Recomendado
I thought this was the one with power and volume control.  Disappointed that, that one is not on sale when I look.
We can get so much more with this.  We have had cable and so on, and never received the channels we to with Firestick TV
I have to restart the power on the Lite too frequently. I thought it were my app but it is the FireStick itself. Once I restart it, the sound returns. This happens at least once a week.

I didn't like the firestick lite because it stalled alot and hulu and you tube was always going out .I had to keep uninstalling and reinstalling them. The regular fire stick is good but not so much the amazon lite  fire stick.

We had a 1st gen that was having issues, after research we discovered it was simply because it was old. We just needed a little something for the bedroom TV since it can't do apps and the lite version is perfect. Lets us run all our usual apps philo, netflix and disney+.

This product is awesome for consolidating all streaming networks into one spot. Voice recognition is great to have and I would highly recommend this product. It does more than I even thought it could.
Best product ever madeWe got ride of cable last year and this lived up to it name great product I bought 5 one for every room
So far this has been a good move.  Still looking at what packages I have purchased and trying to see if there is a bundle with everything in it that will reduce the monthly cost.
great item. i don't have a smart TV, so this product helps me to get Netfix, Prime movies and Youtube. love it
There is so much on this little fire stick, it'll take me two lifetimes to watch it all! I also found it extremely easy to set up as I am NOT tech or electronic savvy. Love it!!!!
This was an easy install, easy to use, does the job, quick delivery and great price. All-round great purchase!

Had no problems setting it up and it is very easy to use. Voice command works great. Request a program, app, or service and it takes you right to it. It can access any streaming service I can think of. I can't think of anything bad to say about it.
Great fire stick, it does everything it is supposed to do.  I like that I can use Alexa to find shows to watch.  The stick works like it is supposed to.  I havnt had any problems.
This is not what I expected. They are VERY nice! The remote and just the whole setup in general for $17 is amazing.
Picked this up to work with my PLEX server and absolutely love using this to switch to different streaming services.

I Haven't found a single use for this thing. the only reason I bought it  is because someone  stole my old one  so I had empty void inside I needed to Fill. Worthless unless you sub to one of the streaming service.
I like the simplicity of use and the ease of installing to get up and running. also to download apps is very simple..

I have 3 Roku Players in our home. 2 Roku Ultra's and the new streaming stick+.  I upgraded the the kiddo's to the new Roku streaming stick+. It works better than the previous roku express streaming media player. Turns the TV on and off without another remote. The picture quality is Great. It was easy to install. Easy to set up. You don't even know it's there.  We like the Roku layout. We like that you can require a pin to make purchases on the Roku or add channels. We love not paying for cable or satellite. We love being able to choose the channels we want to watch. Amazon Video, Netflix... you name it they are all available at your fingertips via the Roku. Something for everyone in the home to watch or listen to. Once we got the Roku's we ditched apple tv and all the others we used. No need for them. Roku ecosystem was better for us. We subscribe to Sling TV and have been very happy so far with that set up. We have good internet access throughout our home using google wifi. Would recommend that setup if you would like to do your whole home.

Overall, the Roku streaming stick works as advertised. It is very simple to set up and the interface works very well. The only thing that I would like most is the ease of moving back and forth from TV (cable service) to streaming service. Every TV/service I currently have still has a learning curve and sometimes mind-numbing way of switching back and forth.

Best thing I've purchased for the TV. I "cut the cable", installed a rotor antenna for the local stations and bought a Roku (actually, I have several, now). It nicely fills in the void between cable and broadcast TV without the colossal monthly bill.

Product overheats constantly. Starts to overheat within 5-10 minutes of turning it on.Roku said to put an extension cable on it. Tried that. Still overheats just as fast.Roku said to put it somewhere with airflow. Moved it to out in the open air in front of my entertainment center. It sticks out and has air flowing on all sides. Still overheats in 5-10 minutes.This appears to be a common issue with the 4K models.This is my fourth Roku stick. The previous ones were not 4K and worked very well. This one is not up the same level of quality.

I was a DISH satellite girl for years until my son introduced me to the Roku streaming stick. I was hesitant for awhile. Truthfully, I bought the Roku streaming stick and procrastinated for literally a year to activate the stick. Finally, after getting frustrated with the monthly fees of over $150. per month I finally activated the stick and I'm kicking myself for not doing it when i bought it! I love streaming TV and only the channels I want, not paying for channels I never watch and subscribe to Live TV as well for under $60. per month! Love, Love the Roku and I will never go back to satellite or cable TV again!!

This product is a bait and switch!!!!  They require a $75 activation fee to use the device or they will shut off all devices. So I bought a new Roku for the basement just to watch Netflix on and now my other Roku which was working perfectly has been disabled because I refused to pay the fee. Rokus channels are terrible I wouldn’t pay $3 for their service. Terrible!!!! Roku Customer service argued with me over paying for Prime. I’m sorry Roku you are not Prime and you will be promptly returned.
Love my roku's.  No more cable boxes other than hd dvr.  Plus can take this anywhere and see my shows, recordings, access my media server, and see my digital content at my finger tips when traveling.

It's great!  When we go on vacation we always hook it up to the room TV and many times you don't need the AC power cord because the TV can power it itself.  We pull up Netlfix and Amazon Prime and watch what we want without having to pay for premium channels.  It's easy to hook-up.  Great investment.  It's on our vacation packing list.

It was suggested to us by our cable provider to purchase this product for our bedroom tv to save money so we didn't have to pay the monthly fee for a cable box.  We were skeptical but figured it was worth a try.  It was easy to hook up and works great!  We've not had any issues with streaming tv in our bedroom and our WIFI box is in our living room.  The only con....my husband wishes we could access our recorded items on our DVR but it's a small price to pay for saving money!

I upgraded to this model from the original Streaming Stick specifically for the extended wifi range. Not impressed. I would say it's perhaps a 10% improvement, certainly not 4x. And the voice recognition is spotty at best. Reminds me of Siri. At some point you get frustrated and just quit trying.
Tried this new fire stick lite for my kids tv. It glitches more often then it wants to work! Will be returning....
Oy, so much to pick through.  It's rather ironic how narrow your field gets when the options are limitless.
I bought these for my kids room, and they absolutely love them!! My girls love to dance so they are always asking Alexa to play some music! It’s the best money I’ve spent in a while! Would recommend!
Super easy to use and set up. Bought the power adaptor that goes with it so we don't need to plug it into the wall. Highly recommend!
You have to look up a YouTube video to find a way to jailbreak your fire stick so that you have way more options.
just what I needed
Best thing amazon sells. I have 4 of them lol. Dont get the one 10 bucks more no difference except power switch

For the price at 2999 plus tax this is a bargain. You will have a remote that is voice operated with Amazon Alexa. The fire-stick does absolutely everything that the bigger 4K fire stick does yet at a very minimum price. I absolutely love this item and I've had this is zero problems

This is my third fire stick but the only one that’s lite. I purchased it for our guest room TV and I’m very glad I did our guest can enjoy their favorite prime show/movies without feeling they’re monopolizing the family TV!!!

I love my Firestick!! I just don't know why I took so long to get one. Easy set-up and so many channels to watch for free!!I also live that I can access my favorite cable  channels as well. I bought three!! One for my sister and two for my home. Best little device ever! 😘🤣🎉

This fire stick does not work. Within a few weeks of having it, it will no longer start. I have to unplug it and plug it back in to get it to start. Now the sound is no longer working. I plugged in another fire stick and the sound was working so I know it’s not an issue with the tv.
This firestick makes a great addition to cable or satellite tv.  You are able to get a lot more movies, etc.
It is faster than the original  fire stick and the Alexa is a nice touch , if you are into things like that.
I really like being able to ask Alexa to find what I’m looking for. I am An older person and not necessarily teckySo having Alexa do it for me makes it much easier to use
Did not realize there was no volume button on the remote. Not really what I wanted but will do for a back up.
Perfect for my 9 year olds TV in her room. I was able to restrict it where theres no way she can get to anything inappropriate.
Very easy to set up. User friendly. I bought one for each TV because they are faster than the built in internet reciever.

Firestick was great for about 4 months. It was fast and easy to use. Then it just quit working. I still had my 1st gen stick which I was able to plug back in and use but what an unfortunate time to go down. It is bracket time ya know.
This is my 3rd fire stick but my first lite version. Excellent especially for what i paid for it. thank you
I like my fire stick. I am still learning about it and also having to do different logins and passwords is not something I am a fan of it can get expensive too

I have both the Amazon Firestick and the Roku stick.  I prefer the Roku as the remote allows us to control the TV.  Picture quality is good and streaming is good.UPDATE 01/28/19Both Roku streaming sticks I have have are now unusable.  After only a years time!  I’ve tried new batteries, different TV’s, unplugging them.....all kinds of things but they still freeze up or don’t respond.  I can no longer recommend Roku devices.  I’m back to my Amazon Firestick.

To install this product, the seller requires the buyer to supply a credit card number for billing purposes. I don't want to be tethered to Roku and I refuse to be billed regularly for the use of the product. I will not be using the product.

So I got this Roku streaming for my kids room and only after 2 days the remote won't connect to the TV even after trouble shooting it and disconnecting it nothing works. I guess this was a waste of money

I just opened my box and the only thing in there was a remote. i called someone and they just kept rambling about a 100 dollar registration fee and 50 to get that stick. I paid both fees and never got any type of conformation for the registration or to get the streaming stick. I am Livid.

There is nothing to dislike about this Roku streaming stick.  Fabulous wireless connectivity that works both upstairs and downstairs, away from my modem.  Better than the premium Roku device I purchased previously.

I loved this streaming stick so much I had to purchase 2 more for our other rooms! The voice control and remote that controlled power and volume on TV is very convenient! Also like that I could download and watch my paid cable Xfinity. Airplay for my iphone is included as well!!

We have a roku house 4 total. Most sticks. Works great good fast responses, i love i can use remote app app on my phone. So easy to plug in and connect to wifi.  Good for travel easy to take with and stick in hotel tv

I own an older version of Roku and decided to upgrade. The new Roku Streaming Stick+ is perfect and work far better than my old unit. It hides behind my TV and delivers great picture along with extra features. Great buy!

Nice device, very capable, with easy setup. But be aware of all the reviews, this one included, highlighting the very short battery life for the remote control. 3-4 days is typical. Roku is aware of this but there doesn't seem to be a fix out.

simple design. my buy motivation was to stop the buffering issues on my generation one streaming stick. this 2nd generation solved the buffering problem. As simple as that. The remote review. Simple classic design. everyone can use and immediately understand it. can turn tv on and off, and adjust tv volume. no more multiple remotes needed. speed dial hulu and Netflix. This is my review after 2nd day. expect and hoping for long product life. Look and Feels like a quality product.

Delivered just an hour ago, haven't even been able to even set up the product, as the left and right buttons on the remote are non-functional, up and down work and most other buttons work just fine. We can't even enter the Wi-Fi password to complete the setup, extremely frustrating. And "due to COVID19, NO phone support AT ALL! Looks like this will end up being returned. Not worth $40 for a useless product...
Delivered as expected, super easy setup and very affordable. Great for the family. Had to get one for every tv in the house. Money well spent and the entire family is happy.

I like this a lot, very responsive & fast. I can watch my Xfinity sub anywhere within my wi-fi range. Apple TV, Disney +, prime video, Xfinity & Pluto free TV is all I need! And hundreds of other channels to add on.The stick has one end that plugs into the TV’s HDMI port & the other end plugs into a electrical wall socket - that’s it! Move it to any TV in the house or outside. Great to travel with too!

Our Smart TV is so old that Hulu and Amazon are both no longer supported. I'm so glad that we decided to purchase the Roku instead of a whole new TV. Everything is working great now. Interface is so much better. Free channels are a huge bonus. I can see the national news now as well as see congress in session.

This is the third Roku I have owned (Roku 2 & 3), and by far the easiest to install and immediately use!  Simply find a USB port on the back of your Smart TV and plug it in.  Within a few minutes of starting up, verifying most recent software update, and then logging into your account, you’re ready to start streaming!In addition, the remote can easily control the Roku, even though the stick is plugged into the back of the TV, without a direct line of sight.  No hiccups, no delays, just quick and easy control on the first click!I love the Roku Stick!!!

This product functions well once setup but I found the setup process to be tedious and a little frustrating .For our display, the stick would not fit directly into the HDMI port due to the size of the Roku Stick.  Roku freely offers a cable extension but be aware that if you need this, you will have to order it on the Roku website which takes a few days to receive.
Easy to install and set up.  Used it with older tv (about 6 yrs old) and had no issues with set up or remote interface.

After about three weeks I’ve experienced major pains to the point where I’ve decided to replace the item. The stick has crashed a few times where apps would have a delayed response and sometimes not even respond. In other scenarios the stick won’t even activate from the screen saver, which requires me to unplug the outlet and wait a few minutes to hard reboot. I generally recommend Roku but this is a piece of trash and I’d avoid this version of a Roku stick.

This is a great upgrade from previous models.  What I didn’t know is that it can pair with my Apple devices!  So much better than paying for a Apple TV streaming device.  I am still learning to use the remote but the voice recognition working the way I thought it would with YouTube TV.  I was hoping to search for channels but instead it just try’s to open separate apps.  I do enjoy this device- especially the ability to control RV sound from the side remote.

It works great! Very easy to use (my 4 year old quickly learned how to use it to get the shows that she wanted).  I love the quick access buttons on the bottom for netflicks and hulu.  It was very easy to set up.  I only wish it had a remote find feature like the ultra has, because I lost the clicker and it was never found.  To replace the remote, I had to pay almost $30, because it is not the same as other roku devices.  (However, there is a free phone app that works like a remote.)

Roku stick works great with picture quality although the controller it was working good at first and now weeks in the volume button and power button do not work. I like the fact i was able to control my tv with it but now that it doesn’t work now have to use two separate controls . Not satisfied with the control
Needed an additional Fire Stick for the spare bedroom. Purchased this one on sale and received it promptly.

Like the convenience of the all in one controlled. No more using 2 controllers. Very happy with this. I have had a Roku 3 for at least 4 years and no problems. Can't afford cable and this is the perfect solution. Picture is awesome and sound is awesome. Great quality and so easy to install.  Roku gives you so many options.

This is our third Roku device, we have been using them for years. The Roku Streaming Stick+ | HD/4K/HDR Streaming Device with Voice Remote works great with our 1080p Television but does not work with our older 720p television. It causes the 720p TV to keep seeking a video resolution and the TV strobes on and off. The same 720p TV works fine with the older Roku unit. So, I only use it on the 1080p TV. I also think the voice remote should work in more areas on the Roku interface.

This thing is my life. I use it daily to watch TV on a 4K TV. Zero lag, fast to navigate and picture quality is top notch for 4K programs. I had a Roku 3 and an old Roku stick which was one of the originals. This 4k stick packs a punch surpasses the speed in processor of all the Rokus that I've owned.  Roku has done outstanding in making their products more compact and even more powerful!

I like the streaming stick, my only problem is that the remote quits working, an the only way to overcome it is to remove the batteries. Once reinserted it usually works, but it is a hassle to deal with everytime I use it. Not easy to get ahold of Roku.

I am Roku fan, but normally I have the previous version of the streaming device which works very good and is cheaper. With this streaming stick, from time to time I have to disconnect the HDMI because is too hot. I am afraid it could cause damage to my TV or even a fire. In addition sometimes the device froze and again I have to disconnect it, it is annoying having to do this when it happens

Super-easy to set up.  Have a Roku TV, so already a fan of the interface.Took 10 minutes total, to auto-recognize TV controls, set up all the streaming channels, and get Plex and NAS going.And, it has zero horizontal footprint: just a cable coming out of the back.At $29, it's a steal.
I had problems activating but I called Amazon and they were very nice to help me. I’ am very happy with my Roku.

I love Roku and this streaming stick was great for 1 1/2 years but the remote is not working right at all and a replacement is pricey cause its a wifi remote.Other models  remotes can be replaced for $8 compared to $25 for this one. I think  the premiere model looks fine and a whole set up only $9 more than the stick remote alone

Really Roku?  You can't include and HDMI cable.  The stick is too long to fit into the area around my HDMI ports - so, unlike the  Firestick, which includes a short HDMI jumper, this is poorly designed and will not work.Sending back and sticking with Firestick
Our internet is horrible here , we can only use after midnight,  love it just wish our internet was better
Volume was up and then down.  This is the 3rd fire stick in my house and after 10 days it quit all together.
It goes easily to my AT&T app so I can watch the tv shows I want without paying for so many I don't watch.

Es perfecto facil uso infinidad de peliculas noticias y un navegador perfecto... Pensar quelo compre solo para ver HBO 😁 AHORA LO USO PARA TODOIt is perfect easy to use countless news movies and a perfect browser ... To think that I buy it just to watch HBO 😁 NOW I USE IT FOR EVERYTHING
This one didn't seem to have the apps the my $50 one has . I'm not saying you can'tdownload them . The remote doesn't  have a off and on button so it stays on.
Relatively easy to install.  Voice command remote a nice feature.  Viewing channels we never had before on a "non-smart" television. Minimal cost, big return!!
I don’t watch much tv so buying a smart tv isn’t worth it. This fire stick is a great value for what I wanted.
Works perfect, streamed with no glitch,  got the discovery plus app added with  no issuesVery happy.
It was so easy to install and it’s doing exactly what I wanted to do so I really am happy with this product

My family owns about 4 firesticks and we have been nothing but amazed. They work very well and we've never had one stop functioning, even the first one that my daughter received as a Christmas gift around a year ago. Love the app variety. Looking forward to Amazon working on more agreements with other entertainment networks in order to get more apps added.
It was simply the sales price. I have a number of these.  They have allowed me to eliminate the boxes the cable companies "rent" to us each month.
Works as well as the regular model, just have to use the TV remote for sound and turning the TV off and on.
Love this! It was a Christmas gift and is so easy to use. It has changed my tv viewing. So much to choose from.
Easy to set up and use. Exactly what I expected. My only concern is the remote. It was flimsy right out of the box. It IS going to fall apart, the only question is when.
Trabaja bien LO ÚNICO MALO QUE NO TIENE CONTROL PARA TV Y HAY QUE USAR LOS 2 CONTROLES EL DEL TV Y EL FIRE!

This is my third Roku and this one is working as reliably and impressively as I expected. Still not much 4K content available, but this device works great with what I have watched, and it also up-scales regular HD, surprisingly and very nicely. Nice work, again, Roku.

I like Roku products in general.  I have 3 roku ultras which is their flagship model. Those work great. I replaced this "roku stick" with a Premier 4K/HDR for $29 refurbished which worked out of the box.

I bought this because I use Hulu Live and it kept freezing on the firestick. I’ve had no issues with the Roku. I love it and love the available apps. Easy setup and easy to use.

The remote is not overwhelming for users who are intimidated by too many buttons.  Even my housemate, very tech-challenged is able to feel comfortable using the Roku.  Easily the best feature.  The speed of connecting to a service and the clarity of the buffering speed of loading is amazing.  And I was able to return two of three cable boxes, effectively cutting two thirds of our cable bill (I purchased two Roku).

I have several of these. Using this one at camp where there is poor TV reception. Generally very good except taking off one star due to not working with Amazon Prime on the camp wi-fi. Netflix works fine up there so I guess we'll have to troubleshoot why it keeps saying we don't have Prime when we do.

Seemed like a really great streaming option for the 1st week or 2. On fortunately it started freezing up on power up returning to star rating instability. Will try to do in exchange 1st and see if it's just a faulty unit. If so and the 2nd one works correctly well update with more favorable review.

The thing about this is theres not alot of free programing with it. It is great if you are looking to subscribe to aps.For 10 bucks u need one that gets pluto and then like 5 diffrent ones u can subcribe to for 6 bucks.U can easly spend as much as u would on cable with this thing.

I am so glad I bought this product.  It has given me many hours of quality TV time that one can no longer get with just regular TV, to say nothing about saving me a lot of money on expensive channel packages that are offered.

Due to prices tripling, I cancelled cable four years ago. Then due to the world's worst customer service, I cancelled DIRECTV. I got Roku. I give it 9.5 out of 10. I can't criticize much. It would be nice if I could arrange my favorite channels in a place I could find them more easily. (A more organized channel manager might come later, though.) Pretty great overall. I love the range of the Wi-Fi. That's why I chose this streaming device over others. Very happy with it.

Great fire stick upgrade. Love the lite, no excess baggage. I have it in my car working with my hotspot, the best thing ever.
Not used much, then unexpectedly stopped working as in totally dead. I own 3 Amazon Firesticks and never had a problem, just bought a 4th. Never did like Roku! ROKU... Risk-Of-Killing-U for $60.00

it's a little bit not perfect, I have it being powered off one of the USB ports on the back of the TV, it does get enough power and everything was fine for a wile but now after power up the remote needs to be kept very close to the TV tell it links to the Roku. if your holding it wile sitting on the couch it wont link. kind of goofy in that regard but otherwise it's very good.

Love the versatility of our ROKU’s. We bought several to use in our vacation rental and they work great!! Easy set-up and easy to use. Easy to personalize.

We cut cable and use the Roku sticks throughout our house and by far this voice one is the easiest.  Took just minutes to set up, took me longer to explain to my husband how to use it LOL! Super easy tho and he's a happy camper...which means this was a great purchase for us!

After 52 days, the volume control stopped working properly -- the volume automatically went up continuously or down continuously -- it could not be adjusted to a specific level.  Other controller functions also stopped working.  I could not determine if the problem was with the controller or the streaming stick.  The problem was not with the TV or wireless/internet connections.

This streaming stick is the best yet from Roku. 4K and fast response from a stick format is a definite leap ahead. This is the first Roku stick format that doesn't feel like a compromise. Powers fine off the USB port on the back of my TV - just takes several seconds to boot up when I turn the TV on. I also really like that there is now TV power and volume right on the remote. I have the TV mounted on the wall with an extremely thin cord track that runs down with only the power cord. Made for a very easy and clean looking install. Roku has an extremely extensive channel lineup. I just wish they would update their interface. Voice search and app launch also works well. Highly recommended!

I love the Roku Streaming Stick!  We do still have one tv on cable and the roku replaced a box that was costing $ 8.00 a month.  Paid for itself in just a few months.  The new remote has volume and power buttons on it so we only need the tv remote if we need to change the input or menu items.
The fire stick is exactly what i expected. There are no tv controls hence no volume controls.  Picture quality is fine. The remote control is just as the others I have
except for the no vol or power for TV it is the same as normal one. I use my echo dot to turn tv on/off.
The tool is a very easy to install, it can be done in a few minutes, and is very easy to use, highly recommended
The remote works great! It’s all I need in a FireTV stick! I can’t speak to the picture quality or volume control features.
Works just like my regular fire sticks except that a tv remote is necessary for power and volume.  In my opinion, totally worth it for the savings.
This item does everything I need it to do and it was on special at Home Depot of all places for $ 17.00

Just about a straight forward install and play device.  Great picture from the opposite end of my house where the router is located.

My husband loves to watch the old movies and the fire stick provides him with more than he can ever watch.

Great and easy to use product! So much content and much more flexible compare to the AppleTV. I have has this for 7 months and it has stopped working. The remote will not pair with the device and it turns out that's because the device (although it says it's connected) is not connected to anything and will not connect. I have roku's on all of my TVs but i will never purchase another and will warn others not to purchase as well.

I really like my Roku. I had one about 10 years ago and loved it. A few years ago my daughters bought me a smart 4K tv and I gave my Roku to a friend (they love it, got rid of their Dish satellite). I had lots of problems with the smart tv apps and decided to go back to Roku. Glad I did. Love the 4K content. This is my 4th Roku and it only lasted a couple of weeks my 3rd Rouku lasted 6 moths. I returned the last one for a Fire Stick which is more reliable as I have had one in the past.  I will no longer buy Roku even though I like the software layout better.

First off delivered when promised.  So far it's a no brainer.  If I could use Roku for all my TVs I would.  I abhor cable and think there are too many TV stations that are free that cable charges for but I live far away from a place that is able to pick up on an inside antenna without a TV service.  So.  Roku answered my prayers.

We were looking for a way to cut our overpriced cable bill so my son recommend trying a Roku to replace the boxes the cable company supplies.  I ordered it and it was delivered the next day. The Roku was so easy to install, the entire process took me 15 minutes including online set up. The picture quality is amazing! Much better than what the cable company provides. I even re-watched the GoT episode Battle of Winterfell and were able to actually see it! I will be buying more to replace the cable boxes I have left in the house. It's worth every penny.
Product works great . I love it . I have a very clear picture and I can add more apps as needed .

Easy set up, easy to add channels, ability to control TV on/off and volume without two remotes is nice.Good picture quality. All around nice unit and a great upgrade from my old Roku box.Voice search is spot on.
We love the amount of channels, we signed up with youtube tv as well and the total with adding all the premium channels is $50 less then Directv with half the premium channels. This is a no brainer.

The remote just stopped working. I was watching the TV, changing channels and everything. I turned the TV off,  returned later and the remote failed to function. It wouldn't even turn TV on! I hadn't had a chance to sync my echo.

I have a Vizio TV and it does not offer certain channels/apps that I really want, so I purchased the Roku Streaming Stick. My boyfriend had a Roku TV and I really liked it which is why I chose Roku over the Fire stick. I did have to do a bit of Google research on the different types, but I found lots of sites to help me. Delivery was fast and set up was easy. I like that I can control the power and volume with the Roku remote control too. I love it!

I've had this Roku for 5 weeks and used it for 4 and gone through three sets of batteries.  Now I leave them out of the remote unless I am pushing buttons.The Roku website is terrible, no way to ask questions or contact them except to return it (at my expense) ... and you have to search for that.

I bought this Roku Streaming Stick to be the one we travel with, but it's such an improvement over one of my old Roku devices that I just might use this one for double duty as a device for my home TV and for travel.Sets up easy, links to my accounts and performs well.  With the low price and high-quality performance, this one is a real bargain.

booted up fine minus having to pay for the same shows that I already have on Sling TV. I do like the fact that you won's have to use your TV remote to turn the TV on any longer. I have not tried talking to the Roku yet though.

This product replaced one that was always out of order for one reason or other. So far, no problems with this one.
Don't know how we ever made it without this thing,  it works great and I love that it has all my subscriptions in one place

The picture and quality of picture is sharp and clean. Remote easy to use.  If it only had a volume control button. But then it takes little effort to use tv remote to turn volume up. Good buy for the money.

I GOT THIS FOR MY OUTSIDE TV TO LIVE STREAM THE FOOTBALL GAMES. WORKS GREAT FOR THIS PURPOSE!

This is by far the best smart device out there. You can download apps from the internet and install them with ease. One thing in special above everyone else is the home integration. Highly recommended and good price with the premium Amazon fast delivery make a smart choice 👍.
This remote has a tv button that lets you choose from many, many free tv stations to stream. I love it!!!

Works great I love how responsive it is and that the remote is not radio controlled so you do not have to have the remote pointing at the receiver. I love how responsive the remote and operating system is. I love the voice recognition capabilities of it but have not used it enough but that's one of my favorite features of this product.

This thing is awesome, gives you 4k and you cant see it.  I do not like the Samsung Smart TV interface, the Roku fixes that and has more apps to boot.  The only downside is the remote eats batteries like its paid to do it and doesn't always connect quickly, but the Roku app works so well on any smart phone that I do not consider it an issue.

The Roku Streaming Stick+ has been a very positive experience thus far. This is the third different generation of Roku devices I have owned and probably my favorite so far. I like the ability to plug the stick directly into my TV through both the HDMI and USB for power. Doing so keeps the device hidden from view and doesn't take up any additional space. I was a little hesitant, at first, thinking the stick may not be sufficient for my household WiFi configuration, as I have gigabit fiber service, but this device would be utilized on a floor above the router in a room I previously used a hardwired streaming device. So far, though, the results have been great. Signal strength has been strong and I have not suffered any performance issues. I have also enjoyed the remote with this device. Private listening over the mobile app is a nice feature compared to the audio output on the remote on one of my other Roku devices.Overall, I have been impressed.

Yeahhhhhh.... this thing put Google Chrome to shame.  I have it on a 2015 smart TV that was just slightly too old to get Hulu Live so I needed a streaming stick. I actually stopped using the smart TV features and just use the Roku instead. The interface is so much easier to use!  The clarity is outstanding on a 4k Ultra HD tv!

Beware that you will not be able to use this on a wall mounted flatscreen if your tv doesn’t have the HDMI port where it’s parallel to the wall! It cannot stick out. Luckily we have another Roku and switched, but check your ports before buying this because it does stick out. It says “flatscreens” but cannot be used on all!!!

I use an older model at home and purchased this one for my cottage. It works even better. The dongle is located behind the TV but the remote works from all places in the room. I would definitely but this product again.

These Roku sticks are required to plug into the wall. There advertised to plug into your television using a USB port however when you do the batteries only last two days and your remote control. Roku should really be doing something about this. I spent time going back-and-forth with their health department and their answer was to plug it into the wall. Kind of defeats the purpose when your TV is hanging on the wall and there’s no outlet available.

The remote is small and easy to use, fits my hand nicely. With the TV on/off and volume buttons I don't have to use the cumbersome TV remote at all. I can stream Roku, Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, Hulu, YouTube, etc. and use only the Roku remote. I'm glad I bought Roku.
The remote stopped working as it should after a few months. I had to buy a new one,  although I think that I bought the Protection Plan for it. I believe that I am due a new remote from you.
The Stick overheats posing a fire hazard for the device, the tv and the house. This is a known problem by Roku. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!!

I could not access my  cable channels on it and the roku customer service phone number has a recording that says it has no telephone customer service for this model. Love this thing and it saves me several hundred dollars a year paying for dish tv. I’ll never go back.

Superior value. Greatly improved remote and user interface for fire TV stick. Impressed and highly recommended!
Less then 20$ And all I had to do was plug it into the tv and download all my apps. I’m so happy with it!

I absolutely love my fire stick. It feels like a having a tablet that is only for streaming. I can even connect my Bluetooth keyboard and type in the websearch or look for shows that have a different style of spelling.
this is the best for non smart TVs, or even smart tvs, its very easy to use, recommended for everyone!
WE have other Fire Sticks , the new Fire stick Lite ,is real nice easy to setup Etc. Will buy again .

Do Not Waste Your Money! This fire tv stick is trash! It will not stay connected to the internet so I get a million error messages! It will not successfully connect to many of my apps and continue to kick me out of them! The quality is very very poor and I just hate it all the way around!
This is my fourth  fire stick and just like my other one it’s work’s great I’ve have one on each one of my TVs
I ordered this for my TV in the sewing room.  The deal was outstanding and I am very pleased with this purchase.

The remote is glitchy & painfully slow. The remote just refuses to work about 50% of the time & when it does it is often very slow. I like Roku's interface but not enough to deal with the lousy performance. I will probably be going back to the competition.

Spent the better part of an hour+ trying to pair this incredible piece of machinery. Changed batteries. Unplugged Stick several times. Unplugged tv several times. Hooked up via USB. Hooked directly to power. Looked at ROKU's support page. No help. A few YT videos. No help. To say disappointed is an understatement.
I had a Fire stick, but thé Roku has a much better interface and doesn't tell me low storage non stop.

Roku has the best user interface. The Home button makes it simple to get out of a complicated location where intuition will not get it done. Range of control is great and voice recognition is excellent. I’m cutting the cable and this is a great base product to start on that journey.
I put this on the tv in the bedroom, and my wife just loves it.  She can watch cable when she goes to bed.  The picture is perfectly clear, and all of the controls are pretty intuitive.NICE.

We have had issues connecting our tv to our internet because it’s on the other side of the house. i really love the new roku stick! amazing!!! it seem to come with "bonus features" as the remote is also synchronized as the TV remote so no need for more than one remote! it also came with a cable extension which is also awesome! i will enjoy it!!! oh and the picture is amazing so much more clarity in the high definition! thank you!!!! good seller!!!
I struggled getting my Chromecast to connect to the wifi in the back bedroom of the house. So far, this Roku has had no problem connecting to the internet and streaming whenever I go to use it.

This is the 3rd Roku I have purchased. They work as described. Follow the instructions and be patient. I bought the Roku sticks to replaces Comcast boxes and save money - definitely worth it. No longer get sound with my picture. This worked fine for a few months and then it started giving me low USB power message and asking me to use an approved cable/power. It would keep crashing and most time would not restart even after unplugging and re-plugging it in. Tired waiting for a few mins between those operations as well. I am using the USB cable that came with it that plugs into the power outlet so there should be no issue with the power at all. Will be switching to a better product.

This is a great product. I prefer the Roku over the Amazon Fire Stick. Very easy to set up and use. I got YouTube Tv for $40 a month to replace my cable boxes. Saving $100 a month from switching. I also have Netflix and Amazon Prime subscriptions. This is also good if your have wireless internet and the router is not in the same room. I bought 3 of these to replace cable.

7 days in a week. If I turn the TV on twice a day, that means I'm using this 14 times a week. I have to struggle to get this thing to actually turn on 12/14 times I turn it on. I have to unplug it 6/14 times I turn it on.

Bought the Roku Streaming Stick +  to replace a very old Roku device, and I love it!  Easy to install, set up, and love the new remote with voice activation.  Plus only need this one remote while watching Roku, whereas my old one had to toggle between 2 remotes.  Highly recommend!

I have used other streaming devices in the past and this particular Roku gets my vote. Easy to install and use. Streaming movies and golf lessons continuously makes this a great device and the price is on the inexpensive side.

After reading that Roku's new streaming stick + had voice search capability, 4K, enhanced WiFi connectivity, and the capability to power my TV with the remote, I bought this for master bedroom. Replaced an older Fire TV stick. So far, so good on this. Although I haven't really noticed better WiFi reception, but that could be my connection. I like both Roku and Fire TV products.

I have a 2 year old 55" Samsung Smart TV. My reaction to the Roku after using it for 24 hrs was "WHY DIDN'T I GET THIS SOONER?!" Samsung has one of the better smart TV softwares in the Tizen UI, but it does not hold a candle to the Roku. I recommend the Roku to everyone, even if you have a smart TV. Smart TV UI's can be laggy, hard to navigate, lack proper updates and app availability; whereas the Roku really shines. It is ZIPPY with a capital Z, no lagging. It has the most app availability of all platforms, and updates are constant and regular. The home screen is simple and easy to use. I wish I had bought the Roku when I purchased my smart TV, but I assumed I didn't need it, because after all- I was buying a smart TV. What I didn't know was that the Roku is much smarter.

I have several Roku devices and this one has problems with the audio. While watching a program the sound will get a lot of static. Adjusting audio options does not help. The only way to fix is to do a system restart on the Roku.

Worked as expected. I love but they added the volume control on the side of the remote for the TV that it is paired with. I love my fire stick I have fire sticks in all my t.v.s I have three t.v.s in my house and they all have fire sticks thanks
Awesome & super easy way to be connected to great sites like Disney+, Hulu, Netflix, etc. Great investment!
