Got it on sale before Christmas and couldn't be happier! So much content already installed then activated the 2 that I wanted & works like a charm
Can’t go wrong with the fire stick I cancelled my cable during the locked down and never looked back

so I'm setting my device up and when I go to enter activation code, I get invalid, somehow I'm connect to this guy saying he will help me, 399.00 trying to charge for activating Roku, I'm sooooooooooooo stressed, one was 600, omg, thank goodness I didn't give my bank account, pressuring me over and over I hung up, beware Roku does not charge, now they have my email, address

The problem Stick is in my guest bedroom and has stopped working.  Iunplugged it and reinstalled it and it worked for a couple of minutesand then stopped again "no signal" message.I took the Roku Stick from another TV and installed it on this TV and itworked good.  I have never had an issue with WIFI signal in our home soI think this Stick has failed.I have tried to communicate this problem to Roku rep "Prawinraj" but have been unable to get a replacement under warranty.  The other Stick is working good.VERY POOR Customer Service
This is great!  Got us the capability of a smart tv without having to buy another tv.  Very happy with price and performance.  Was easy to set up and it’s easy to move to a different tv.

Love it.  $50 on BF you can't beat it.  Cant' beat it at full price either.  THIS is the gold standard for streaming sticks.  Crystal clear picture, intuitive interface, fast, 4K HDR and IR blaster in the remote.If you just need 1080p then the 3800 stick is probably the route you should go but I plan on buying a 4K TV next year and since it was the same price on BF why not?

The Roku stick is awesome. I have a vacation home in a rural area without cable. We use Hughesnet for internet service and this device works great. I have cable service at my other home and I can see some of the channels I subscribe to like NBA League pass and don't miss a game. We would recommend Roku to everyone that would like to watch something other than regular tv. It is easy to set up. We are seniors and not very tech savvy and we set it up within a few minutes.

Took over 2 weeks around Xmas for support to reply to me and another couple weeks to close the ticket after I told them I figured it out in my own. Hopefully that was just a time of year thing. Also it crashes about one a week, on random apps (Hulu, Disney+ etc not crap ones).
Works great and is easy to set up. Was able to modernize an older flat screen we had laying around. Saved us a good bit of money. You can install the Xfinity app on this too, which is great!

These have been great gifts for work. Everyone that has received one is ECSTATIC to own one. I'm happy about this newest version because it supports up to 4K with HDR. This stick provides any TV with an HDMI port the chance to become a "Smart TV."I own a Smart TV and the OS on it is not as robust or fast as these standalone devices.I wish it had some hard line Ethernet capability but most people do not have that available near their TV.

I've had Roku devices for over 10 years and they continue to be amazing.  I have smart TVs, but they are constantly having to buffer on Netflix, etc.  Yet when I use that same smart TV with my Roku - I have NO PROBLEMS STREAMING any service.  Their built-in wi-fi boosters are amazing.  I haven't yet used this in my travel trailer with camp wi-fi, but so far so good.  I refuse to use voice services on all devices so I have no opinion on this feature.

We have two Roku streaming stick+ Setups for our TV’s. We also have a TCL TV for our bedroom. Roku is very user friendly and integrates with other TV hardware well. Went from 2-3 remotes per TV to just Roku remotes. No complaints.

Bought this specifically for the Spectrum app only to find Roku no longer offers it.  I wanted to give it fewer stars but realized that was due to my aggravation - This Roku did not do the one thing I purchased it for.  To be fair, and putting aside no Spectrum, this appears to be a very nice piece of equipment.  Installation went smoothly and it functioned very well.  I would have kept it and been very happy if I could access Spectrum with it.  Roku was returned and 1 star deducted for this reason.
So much better than girestick I had firestick threw it in garbage the apps kept messing up but Roku is easy to use works great very happy with it. I font use alexa much but when I do works good.

I love Rokus and have used them since 2011. Roku devices have enabled me to cut cable with the large and ever increasing cable bills. I got tired of having to pay for channels that I never watch. Roku has plenty of apps and channels for me to watch favorite TV shows, news and entertainment shows. So together with HDTV antennas for broadcast networks and Roku devices, I am set!
I just brought this for the living room haven't used it myself yet but it was easy to set up and add to my existing account. My oldest loved it and it arrived ahead of schedule thank you

WE have had a ROKU TV for several years. This stick has more steps to use it than the regular ROKU TV.  There is definitely more of a learning curve.  The quality of the streaming is good, once you get into ROKU.

There is a known design flaw with Roku remotes that they are unwilling to admit. The remote drains batteries like crazy. I have replaced 4 pairs. This is is not a pairing issue. I have checked with a multimeter and the batteries no longer have juice.  Have tried to contact customer support but they are completely useless. Have tried to contact someone on the forum through PM, but lets see. Buyer beware...

I DONT LIKE that they changed the remote to have different hot shortcut keys. I liked the previous Netflix/Hulu/Vudu/Sling and now it's Netflix/Hulu/Disney+/Sling. HATE IT!!! Oh by the way, I have 2 streaming sticks +- they're both the same, just different models (years) ABSOLUTELY HATE THEY CHANGED THE REMOTE!!!!! Sorry but this is big deal to me. So 0 Stars
I love this! I haven’t really used the voice recognition on it but the stream quality is fantastic and it has all the apps my boyfriend and I use. Super easy to start using! Highly recommend

This is an upgrade from a much older model for me. I like the no need for cords, easy set up, definition and overall reliance. I don't use voice commands very often, so  my opinion might not be the best on that

I purchased 2 Roku. One Roku Ultra and this one (Roku Stick) and I don't know what's going on with the remote control, because it consuming the batteries too fast. I have to replace the batteries every week.
The stick is a perfect way to convert your conventional tv in a smart, tons of apps, easy to install and use.
Got this for my mother to watch HULU on her pre-smart tv era tv.  She can work it just fine.  Easy!
Love this fire stick lite. Just as functional as the more expensive option of fire stick but less money!
I'm hoping this one doesn't burn through batteries like the last.  New face of the firestick page is nice.
I'm loving my fire stick! It's very easy to understand and use and during these times it has given us so much more content! We're thrilled with it!
Very handy device. Simple to set up, worked first time. Only streaming stick I would purchase. Luv it.
The fire stick was exactly what I expected. Easily set up. I can use all the movie and tv streaming apps NP. AND I GOT IT FOR $17

Works great for what I need it to do.  Took a while to find how search for apps, but once I got used to it, I am pleased.  Has the HBO max app which I wanted and didn’t want to spend $179 on a new Apple TV.
Love this.  Got it for my mom who's not so much into tech and couldn't figure out roku. This has voice search,  so it was perfect.
Very easy to set up and works well with Alexa and voice controls. Super low price for great system.

This is the 4th firestick product I have. This one has been absolutely horrible. It constantly kicks me off(Hulu, Motor Trend, and Amazon shows). Every other time, it won't have sound, so I have to restart the firestick again. I have no problems with the 2 regular firesticks or the cube. I would spend the extra money and get the regular firestick.

Worked liked I hoped it would.  We had a 65” slightly older Samsung tv that came out just before the smart TVs and we wanted to be able to connect to the internet so we could watch prime tv. Plugged it in and it auto updated and we were watching tv.
It works as described. I bought the one without tv controls and it’s just fine. I can turn the tv on and change the volume with the remote that came with the tv, this allowed me to save some money.
I brought this for my son and he absolutely loves it. I brought this for my tv in the living room as well bc I have another in my room. The best when it comes to streaming and binging.
Love this Fire TV Stick Lite with Alexa Voice Remote!!!! you can just talk to it and it will find or tell you stuff!!!! the wifi works better on this one, than the old ones did!!!!!
The lite fire stick is easy to set up and use. It's got a variety of functions that are useful like the local news app. I just wish there were more apps to choose from.
great  for the price. I can now watch alot of programing on old flat screen in pool area that didn't have smart capability.
If you watch any streaming services get this device.  I love it.  I have friends that have other ones and they do not work as good.  Screen selection and less buffering.
We recently downgraded from cable to straight internet. With the Firestick it has been a very pleasant experience!!
IT WORKS JUST LIKE THE MORE EXPENSIVE MODEL ----EXCEPT FOR THE LACK OF SOUND CONTROL  ----NOT GOOD !!!
Got for my parents- only suing it so far on a later model 2016 television. They like it. So, cool.
It is designed only for looking at movies.  It would not let me turn on unknown sources unless I installed an app that required it
This is the second unit to go bad in less than a year. This one lasted 6 months. Time to buy a ROKU.
Using it on my kitchen TV to stream Amazon, Netflix and YouTube.  Alexa has not misunderstood me yet.
I bought this product for my parents. They had one in their room, but it didn't want to connect with the internet.  I decided to buy another one for them.  They were happy that I bought it for them.
Saving money,  no more cable

Various stability problem, most commonly sound stops working until device is reset  It seems Amazon thinks that there is nothing wrong no matter how often you have to reset the device, as long as this works around the problem. 'New' device replaced twice so far
Used it for living room tv. Easy setup. User interface is different but actually better than my other fire stick
Love that able to connect to any tv and to get the apps that want on a tv that don’t get on the tv. Must have
I have two older firesticks and this one is much faster than the others. It installed easily and quickly.

The quality of this rocu is great. I would recommend to get this one instead of the basic one. The voice recognition is fantastic and easy to use. Being able to use the remote to control the TV is great.

Remote broke in under 6 months, forced to either buy a new roku, wait for a back ordered remote on Rokus website, or gamble that a $10 off brand remote works... smh. Ultimately I’ll probably end up buying a brand new system which burns the wallet but less frustrating

You have to be careful As this more powerfulModel may not be fully compatible with and older tv even though it has a USB port.  It would not work on my older Toshiba tv.  Error message not enough power.  It does work with a Newer model.  Seems to be sluggish on remote responses and have had to shut my tv off to get a response.  I don’t have a 4K tv so the older model would have suited me better.  Other than that it’s the same greatRoku.

Moderate difficulty setting up as instructions are ambiguous.  Overheating of device due to excessive miniature footprint.  Extremely POOR phone tech support that only tries to sell additional software and services.  Tech support is only from 3rd party not Roku!

Bought it for my daughter who was coming for an extended stay!  While she was home we learned how to use all the features.  It is a very nice product for the money. We did have several freezes with the stick but after restarting, good as new.  My daughter bought her own Roku to take with her when she left

Roku is very easy to use.  I also have Firesticks on other TVs and did not have good luck on this particular TV. Not sure why, it is an LG and I was always having trouble with the Firestick freezing.  I have not had this trouble with the ROKU. It has been very good with all aspects of streaming.

I've bought 3 and the set up was fast and easy. The remote works great on this model for TV and sound bar volume. Connects TV to my Tablo HD antenna DVR. Now I just pay for internet and a small fee for some streaming services. No more cable TV for me. My Tablo fills in my needs for local channels and about 30 more. Very happy with the Roku.
Twice the remote has stopped working within the first few weeks requiring re-pairing.  A pain.  Unable to pause and resume programs easily.
Use this in my spare bedroom and it works very well. Very pleased.

This works great streaming from different services.  I wish it had a free web browsing app but it doesn't.  The voice recognition doesn't work with my masculine manly deep voice lol, so if it messes up, I use a higher pitched tone and it usually figures it out.  My wife thinks it is funny when I resort to that though.

I could not get this device to recognize my 5GHz WiFi. With NO product support to help, I had to return it. I bought an Apple TV 4k which recognized the same WiFi and connected. ROKU needs to find a way to help people who need help. Currently you are on your own.

DO NOT BUY THE STICK. I have purchased and owned every gen of roku products. This is the first time I bought the stick. It is junk. Reboots itself randomly. Won’t load Netflix or Apple TV most of the time. I don’t know how many time I have had to set this up from start or reset to factory settings. These are just terrible. Consider yourself warned. Don’t waste your money.

Bought 2 units and the controllers- called many times to get support worked good for less then 30 days. Controller turned on tv- they nothing else- couldn’t get onto the networks of shows only volume worked and to turn tv- on and off- called many times for technical support and didn’t help. The 2 tv froze and didn’t work. Total crap service and very unhappy.

We got a roku and a fire stick around the same time. We easily love the Roku more than the fire stick. Our fire stick blacks out, logs us out of all our apps, logs us out of the internet, all of this daily. Our Roku does not do that! I would easily buy the Roku again!!

I prefer the Amazon Firestick interface hands down over this one.  The only problem with Firestick is the Spectrum TV app doesn't work with Firestick.  So I'm stuck with Roku.  It ok and works well.  I have no choice at this point.  Roku IS easier to do searches for channels.  I recommend but prefer the Amazon Firestick interface a bit better.

I timely received this product.  I was having streaming issues with my regular Roku stick.  The Stick+ was the answer.  Better long range and WiFi connection.  Good processor on board the Stick+.  I have not had any more streaming issues since installing Stick+.  I cut the cord and use this to stream Internet video from subscribers with no problems.
Fire is always giving low memory error. Roku is fine there. While I am glad there is now a mute button, it should be above the volume, not in the only area one can use to hold the device.

We had a problem with it but after the cable company replace the router it streamed cable again.  It has to buffer occasionally which the live TV signal never did.  I suppose this thing is a good deal if you really like to stream content but I can watch everything I want at my desktop.
Samsung 6200 does not detect the roku streaming stick +. Not sure why, but my guess is that the HDCP 2.2 on the streaming stick + is not compatible with the older HDMI on the TV.
Seemed like it was going to be a great device....until they forced me to create an account and enter a credit card.  I couldn't even try it to see if I liked it.  Stupid.
Works faster than the original fire stick. Used the voice control only once so far and it worked fine.
I don’t use the Alexa voice feature but I’m really happy with my purchase and the extras I got with the fire stick. Easy to install, easy to use, awesome value for the money
I am really enjoying my fire stick great investment. The price was unbelievable super great price.
Easy to navigate. Voice recognition is amazing, you don't have to type in what you've looking for
So much quicker and streams better than my previous firestick. I love the new home screen as well.
Great for some Free Tv apps... canceled my cable because having the FireStick is more than enough
This little item is incredible!! Makes streaming so simple! Wish I wouldn’t have waited so long to get one!
Streaming quality is poor lots of glitches...after an update by firestick, quality is still poor!
Love my fire tv lots of free shows to watch and u can even have it play ur Netflix or Hulu shows just say something like play family guy on Hulu and I let will.
It was just what I needed for the bedroom TV since it was not a smart TV. Works well and the price was great.
I had no idea that this remote would not operate the volume. With the voice remote it will turn out TV off and on but it will not turn the volume up or down.  Who wants multiple remotes?
It's Great! It was easy to install and get connected. It's a great product. It's better than anything else I have used.
We had an older version of the fire stick and this one is such an improvement! We love it! Works great!
I travel a lot and stay at a lot of hotels. This is great for supplementing the hotel’s tv system. I can my my own shows.
Works great, it just don't have volume control which you can do with your regular remote no biggie. Purchase for guest room so it great!
I wasn’t sure this feature would work since I don’t have an Alexa, but it does. Happy with my fire stick lite.
We like our fire stick but not the lite.  We have to unplug it between uses to get it to work.  It just seems cheap.  Will spend the extra money for better quality I guess.
I had to repurchase a fire stick since my remote went missing and my internet changed. Great product.
I have used Fire Stick for years and i love it.I just ordered 1 for my travel trailer and 2 for gifts
This is just what I needed for my tv as it's not 4k non smart. Perfect solution. Was delivered on time
This may be better than an Apple TV even if they were the same price at $50 its amazing. This is coming from a long time Apple TV fan who owns Apple TV, Firestick, Chrome cast & now Roku.

This is our second one of this model, and third ROKU stick. Could not be happier. They just work. We have a sound bar on the main TV so we use the older 3600R unit for that as controlling the TV and the soundbar via the Roku remote is not really possible. No big deal. But the other 2 TVs, we only ever use the Roku remote now for everything. Highly recommended.
So easy to install. Love watching all my shows and not having to pay that high cable bill.
Just upgraded and love this new Roku!  It processes quickly, the picture quality is great, and the remote was super easy to program to my tv so I no longer need to use my cheap tv remote.
These work great. Bought one for my bedroom and one for my husband's den. We love it. Really irked when they went on sale two days later for $20 cheaper than what we paid for each.

It was so easy to set up.  Someone suggested I set up my Roku account first. After that all I had to do was plug the Roku into the tv. Then plug the Roku into a power source. Then it had to type in my internet security password. Then added channels. Roku walks you thru everything! Easiest thing I have ever done. Wish I had done this sooner. I have so much to watch, I don't know how I will ever see it all! I have cancelled Hulu,Netflix, and Amazon Prime.
Battery drains super fast on the remote - like I need a new battery every 2 weeks.  Kinda sucks.  Otherwise, the device is pretty simple and works well enough.

I got the Roku to try it out, I kept my satellite for the first 2 months I had the roku just to be sure i liked. We love the Roku, so many channels and shows to watch, easy to find and navigate and a hell of a lot cheaper than satellite. Have now canceled the satellite, dont miss it at all!!
Returned this item because it requires you to enter a credit card number. I got this for streaming services that I have already purchased, I shouldn't have to enter a cc number.

This piece of garbage makes me want to go back to paying the cable company $200.  At least its reliable and I dont need to type in passwords and go to websites to activate devices 3 times a day.Roku kept freezing and factory resetting on it's own.  Now I just get the screen saver.Only thing that still works is the remote to turn my tv on/off and adjust volume.
This is the second identical Roku I've purchased, and it does live up to the expectations.  Took about 20 mins to hook up and get all of my apps programmed in.  Lots of free content too.

I give this 4 stars because it wouldn't work without being plugged into my outlet. I have HDMI plugs on my t.v but it still had to be plugged in the outlet. Also doesn't work with my surround sound. Volume comes from t.v. only. Deciding on whether to return it at this time. Side note: Picture is clear and much better than when I had the Roku 3000x.

I'm thrilled with this stick, it's streaming with no problems from a wifi connection my roku express wouldn't even detect at all, beyond that navigation is much, much faster and I love that the remote can turn the TV on/off and adjust volume, so I can actually put my TV remote away and just use this one.

I love this thing. Setup was super fast, so easy to use it feels like I've been using it forever. My tv isn't a smart one but it is now! Voice search is cool and useful. I'm amazed that it programmed itself to the tv so the volume and power buttons on the roku remote operate it. If it had menu control it would be perfect. Feels like I got more than my money's worth so I def recommend it!

This was a gift for my mother who absolutely loves it. She has not used the voice feature and does not have Alexa which is fine she has enough choices by using the remote. She is not as tech-savvy as some people, but this products works just fine for her. Would recommend for other less tech-savvy moms and dads it works great with very little instruction.

Purchased this to use primarily with Youtube TV which we replaced cable with.  Compared to other devices we have on different TVs; the UI is a little slow to load the Youtube app and to get started streaming; but all in all for the price I would say this is very acceptable.

Bought this in June of 2020, could not get to work on HD tv. It cost me 48.00 to get tech help to activate. Now every time we try to use we have to go through wi fi setup. Thought it might be too far away from router so moved it to another room. It still does not work half the time. Don’t waste your money on this one.

Setup was a breeze and the usability is spectacularly easy. The wifi extender is useful and the always ON feature means the Roku is ready as quickly as your TV can turn on. Number of apps is pretty incredibly (haven't found an app to be missing that we wanted). The overall speed is great for a stick (no lag and loading apps is quick). Only minor note is there is no Amazon button, but cant fault a competitor for not applying a dedicated button for their app.
I have not used the voice recognition yet or the Alexa integration, so I do not know about that. Alexa will know everything about you and what do they do with that information?
This device does well at maintaining a connection over brief outages in the streamed data- unlike the Firestick which will dump the connection and force you to re-establish it.

This remote is great for my mother in law, the TV volume and power buttons on the remote make it easy for her. If I give her two remotes to use she doesn’t understand with one does which, so this is great.
I bought this little guy mainly for the amazon music app, but I DO watch some other programs on it as well. Works great for me so far. I haven't had it long enough to notice any problems with it yet

So far so good! I'm using PlayStation Vue for my live TV and love it! Quick and friendly user database. Love the Roku app and being able to use phone as remote. Had to unplug Roku once to reset remote but was quick. Sling TV offers $50 credit and I'm comparing that to PlayStation Vue and it's also good but not as many live local channels. Highly recommend this Roku Streaming Stick Plus. Arrived quickly and no damage. Easy to install as well.
I had an Amazon Fire stick for a few years and it just quit working.  I decided to give this a try and love it!  I am kind of glad my fire stick bombed out. The Roku is easy to use.  5 stars from me.
Since we’ve had this we have had to replace the batteries in the remote at a minimum of every 2-3 weeks. Not sure if we have a defective remote or what but it’s disappointing.
Lasted a little more than a year (so I can't return it) -- will no longer recognize the remote (and yes, I rebooted it and changed batteries in the remote).  Extremely poor quality control.

I bought the streaming stick + because we went from having cable in every room to using Roku. I have had the Roku Ultra in the living room for 2 years and love it. The Streaming Stick + has all of the picture and streaming quality of the Ultra, without the DVR, earbuds, and ability to plug in an USB drive. The streaming stick + can also only get a signal through wifi while the Ultra can get a hardwire internet connection. The $40 price difference for the same performance without the unnecessary options sold it for me. I love the voice remote and the choices for channels is amazing.

I used this on an older LCD TV and it works great.  It maintains a strong wireless connection with no buffering.  I bought a new smart TV that buffers constantly and struggles to maintain a wireless connection at the same location in my house.  The ROKU interface is great and the remote is simple to use.

I was liking the fact that I didn't have to manage a bunch of wires, but it turns out that the USB on my TV wouldn't power this, so I had to use the power adapter.  Other than that, it works very well and is about 50 feet from my modem, so that is a big plus.  I just wish one can turn it off and on so it doesn't have to be connected to wi-fi all day long.
Got it for my mom because my brother and I already one so she could stream all her favorite services and find news she never knew about. She loves it.
The “lite” version was less expensive than replacing the remote for the full version one I purchased a couple of months before and the dog decided to eat!
Am now able to stream tv and save $ each month by ditching a cable box. Easy set up. Easy to use
Love, love the option to use my voice and control my tv with this. I will buy more in the future!

El empaque me vino en buen estado. Solo una pequeña arruga en la cajeta. Supongo no podemos exigir mucho del transporte jejeje. Yo lo probé directo del puerto de la tele, el sistema advierte que no da la suficiente carga para el óptimo funcionamiento del equipo. Pero lo he probado 2 días y no me ha dado ningún problema. Toma las bandas de frecuencia de 2.4 y 5 GHz. Por lo general contento. Gracias
Full featured Fire Stick, just no TV controls, so I use the TV remote to turn on/off and volume.
This lite version is perfect for my toddler’s room. We control the tv and volume so this is awesome.

Buenos Alexa los primeros dias estaba funcionando bien, pero ahora lueo de una semana, ha estado lenta, es decir le pido algo y respodemo a los 2 o 3 minutos, no se que pasa porque el internet esta bien.
I was able to select and launch the programs I wanted and used the other TV controller for sound.
Was pretty easy to set up.  I haven't used many of the features yet but I like that it works with Alexa.
I love this little device.  Having Alexa help with finding shows is great.  It has volume control.  The sites I can visit and enjoy seem endless.  Sorry I didn't try this sooner.
Works ok, we don’t use the voice recognition. Got it for an older Vizio TV that wasn’t working well with Amazon Prime. This seemed to help.
Had the original and wanted an upgrade. This was definitely better! Love the voice command too!
Great product, recommendes to several family members who then also purchased them and love them.

I am thrilled to say that my Amazon Fire Stick is up and running with no problems and complete ease of installation on my older lcd t.v.I am really enjoying the programming available to me and am going to take full advantage of it.so much fun!!

My son talked me into to buying this and I was very hesitant bc I’m use to cable TV...... but I bought it anyway so I will say I love our fire stick... we have Disney + now so all my children are very happy and fire stick has all their apps... so very much satisfying and would highly recommend...
I bought 2 fire sticks for my home. One, we use on the patio tv instead of cable, and the other for an older tv. They both work great with excellent stream quality.
I returned the item to get the next level up as I wanted to be able to control my devices with 1 remote. The Lite version did not do this nor did the voice recognition work as expected.

The Amazon Fire Stick TV offered a great way to access a variety of programming (some free, some with subscriptions required).  We recently dropped our cable TV and this offered a great way to access programming beyond the digital over the air we receive with the antenna.
I wanted to replaced my old fire remote and ended up with new fire stick lite device and its works great

the original firestick  is better than the lite  really wish that amazon would have a block button for prime  so that it cant be accidently added to the program  or at least put a code  so no one can order prime and you  get billed before  you even know it
Cut the cord very long ago using a smart tv, I upped my content when I started using firestick.
This was a great deal on the fire stick...idk why i hadnt purchased one before.  Easy setup and works great
I like that this device is all in one, voice activated and able to stream anything you choose to download.
This is my second Roku, I moved my first one (4years old) to a second TV and replaced it with this one on my main TV. Set up was easy, worked great with no issues. Would recommend it.

What a breeze! Compared to our antiquated Chromecast (maybe 5 years old?) the Roku stick is amazingly easy to use. No need to have a smart phone, tablet, or computer nearby-just plug it in and once you set the stick up (you do need one of the aforementioned items for setup), you do not even need the TV remote to turn the set on/off.  An unknown added bonus was the button that takes you immediately to Direct TV Now.  Only had the stick for two days, but might go out on a limb to say I like it better than my Apple TV!
Set up was a little challenging for middle aged couple. Please know that you still have to pay for Hulu and Netflix...only Amazon prime movies are free.
This was my first Firestick, and I liked it so much,I bought 2,if you love old movies or TV shows, buy it!
Glad I upgraded to the Fire Stick "Lite". Its faster than the older version I had with more clarity.
Has very weak connectivity. It's only about five feet from my router and still loses connection.
Estoy súper contenta con este fire tv no pensé q era tan bueno cuando lo pedí lo recomiendo ❤️👍🏻
Product works great. The low star rating is because it doesn’t control the TV volume. Seems like a very basic feature that should be included.

Yes its cheaper that the FireStick but why exclude volume control? Its 2021, if you have more than one remote for your TV, you're doing it wrong. I much prefer the real firestick and not a lite version that no one really asked for.
I Cut the cable cord and love these sticks! Can use tv for power source so you don’t need wires hanging to outlets for mounted TVs, which is not the case with chromecast streaming devices!

60 days after using it it started crashing when in standby mode. Now every time I want to use it I have to go up and unplug the device and plug it back in. 3 months later I still can't get Roku to RMA it.

This thing starting overheating on day 1.  And the spot where I have it is not hot. Roku, you need to redesign this. I read your page about “what to do for overhearing stick”. Please, don’t make this my problem. Your other products don’t overheat. I’m sending this back.
Had to go back to my Firestick.  Roku loses internet connection and/or locks up every 1-5 minutes, completely unusable. Older non-4k Roku works fine also.

I've had the Apple TV for quite some time. I couldn't see the Live TV version of Hulu w/ my Apple TV 2nd generation - and had to upgrade to do so. After looking on the web and reading reviews, the Roku stood out as one of the best choices and at $80.00 less at that compare to the Apple TV 4th GEN. The set up was painless - programmed itself to control my TV - set up all it's internet connections itself, etc etc. I would buy this for my parents! ;-)

This Roku stick if much better than my old Roku as it has the NON-line of sight remote so it is much more responsive and quick.. especially notice this when using SLING App.  Also love the volume on the remote and voice search is decent.  With the extra boost for WIFI signal we have had very few drop outs.  OVERALL... LOVE THIS NEW ROKU STICK!!!!!

This picks up a wifi signal from a floor below and streams without a hitch.  Setup was fairly simple and it works perfectly.  My TV needed the HDMI dongle so ROKU sent me one quickly and free of charge.
The streaming stick is great, but I can't give this whole thing a great score because my remote simply stopped working after falling about 1 foot in height. It was great for about two months.
Worked great and easy to install. No issues so far. This is the 4th Roku device I have had. All of them still works fine except the earlier one I bought I can no longer make updates.

Always have an issue with connecting to wireless network - and yes, all my other devices have to always connected fine, including the Amazon fire stick which always works to perfection.When I sent Rocco an email they told me to order an adapter which they shipped to me free of charge. Even with that still does not connect - I am going to give them away and get fire sticks from now on.

This is my second Roku and I really like the 4k quality. I use it for most of my TV viewing. The video quality is fantastic. I use my Roku for watching my cable service with the Soectrum app. Great device
A mi familia le encantó, nuestra smart TV ya no podía actualizar el software pero ahora con Roku tenemos acceso a todo el contenido muy fácilmente.
I love being able to watch amazon prime/netflix/showtime/direct now/youtube through this little device. As of now I have officially retired my google chromecast :)
I have 4 Roku sticks and never had a issue with any of them,easy to set up and use. 4K is a bonus

I keep having to take the batteries out and replace them, and I do not mean replace the batteries. . The power button works but but nothing else does at those times.It makes no sense and frankly, the Roku support is not at all supportive. They are usually rude - if you can reach them.As soon as another company comes along I'm going with them.

I love everything about this Roku! Setup was easy, it works great on my older LG 3D tv, that recently stopped support for HULU, prompting me to purchase(after reviewing the different Roku systems available, finding this one to suit my needs the best) this Roku, which now allows me not only access to HULU, but a host of other excellent stations. Worth every penny!

It worked fine WHEN it works. I've only had this Roku for 2 months and had to replace the batteries twice. That's 3 sets of batteries because it came with a set and now the remote doesn't work at all. I contact Roku and they said they would send me another remote. Then in the next sentence they tell me the remote are on back order. Ugh!!! After ordering this Roku taken a month to find the best apps for me I canceled my DirecTV. Now I haven't been able to watch tv in 3 days because of a remote. SMH.

Worst Roku I've ever had. The stick still has to be plugged in to a power source. It's grainy and very slow. Buffers all the time and my router/modem are right next to it. Loses volume and the remote quits working all the time. Apps have to deleted and reinstalled. I've had the original Roku, Roku plus, Roku 3 and Roku ultra. The stick is the biggest waste of money

   Voy a llamar haber si puedo enviar para la devolución  por q no me sirve para la tv de mi niño de 8 años, no entiendo como tiran podructos como ese, lo pedi por error pensando q eran igual q 2 de tengo con control.
Having a few problems but it could be because the tv is an old one and not the fault of the fire stick - not sure
Dont know about volume control but defintely great gift has voice recognition, alexa integration and tons of apps
Me encantaaaaaa, lo mejor que eh comprado, mi tv no es smart y con este dispositivo puedo utilizarlo de muchas formas, amo el. Comando de voz de alexa hace todo mas fácil, gracias amazon!!
Excellent technology. Much more advanced and compatible for good entertainment, home entertainment
It's so wonderful!  We found an instructor on Youtube that taught all the important apps we could add to the fire stick!

Easy to add to TV, but no instructions how to add to Denon Receiver and integrate with AT&T U-verse cable.  Easy integration and setup with U-verse internet. Cost an additional $50 for Geek Squad visit to troubleshoot and setup properly.I like the Toshiba FireTV a better purchase, but is more expensive
I like the fire stick we have in the living room so much they ordered one for a bedroom. It is so easy to use and reliable. You cannot go wrong with this device.
there is no volume control,  you have to use your TV remote to adjust the sound.  that's why it gets 1 star
I just use the fire stick to enable my old TV to get my Prime and Netflix.  I am so grateful it works.
Purchased to replace a 3 year old version that had quit working correctly. New version works great

I upgraded from the first generation firestick so when I got this one, I was very happy with it. It’s way more seamless and easy to navigate and the voice feature is awesome!!!! I don’t even have cable/satellite as many people don’t, and I don’t miss it whatsoever. my old firestick was so slow compared to this one. I’m very happy I upgraded.
Freeze a lot I don't recommend this lite version spend $10 more and get 4k which is much better
I don't have an iphone so the Alexa feature is irrelevant. As a long-time cable subscriber, I am happy to find a quality streaming device to start a new adventure.
This set up very easy.  Nice improvement over the former model, much faster.  Glad I upgraded.
Still learning to use it, but so far I like it, will probably use it more come summer and reruns

Product works perfectly, we didn't think the volume control was necessary so we bought the lite model and saves a couple dollars.I do recommend this in case you don't need the manual controls in the device control.

My first firestick stopped working after 4 months. It was a gift so I ended up purchasing one since I liked it. I enjoy it when it works properly, but I constantly have to get up and unplug the stick from the TV because of sound issues. Im on the second replacement. It seems like a common issue of you look it up. Had my Roku stick for 2 years with no issues.
I didn’t realize this one didn’t have the tv controls. Spend a little more and buy the one with tv controls. You don’t need two remotes then. Otherwise works fine so far

I have Apple boxes and remotes. The Firestick allowed me to get HBO Max, which was inaccessible on an older Vizio TV. The setup was easy. I did it with the instruction manual and didn’t need Amazon’s phone assistance. It’s small but has everything at your fingertips.

Love this.  Only wish that when you power off the TV (which this does!) it would take the Roku to the Home screen.  If you turn off your TV without going home and are live streaming or are on a channel with autoplay, you will continue streaming even with the TV.  That can use up your bandwidth allotment pretty quick.  But other than that, love that this one controls TV on/off and volume, a truly one remote solution for cord cutters.

Cut the cable long ago.  Roku is inexpensive and is very easy to set up and use with sufficient free tv & listening options like Pluto + access to pay options like amazon prime, netflix, et al.  If you're within distance of signals, get an antenna for local broadcast tv.
Get away from sat costs!! You have option to use many services that can be month to month. Save your money amd watch only what you want to pay for. Many free channels as well

I live in a rural community with a low internet signal on my mobile phone.  I am still able to use the Roku off of my mobile hotspot signal. Very impressed! I've just had this for a few days, but so far so good 🙂 I will update if I have any issues, but based off of first Impressions I would definitely recommend.
Product super easy to install and use. Only downside is the brand NEW shrink wrapped Duracell AAA batteries did not last even 2 months when remove is barely used 1 time per day.

Being new to streaming platforms, we had some hiccups.  Can’t tell if it’s a steep learning curve, but we are getting there.  Haven’t tried voice n Alexa functions yet.  We are not displeased with the unit, but sometimes frustrated.  All things in time.

Terrible piece of junk. Barely works. From the first day I started getting warnings that the device was overheating and then it stopped playing my video. Unusable. Wish I could return it but threw out the box already :(

I just cut the cord & am using Roku + to access streaming content. With a YoutubeTV account I can see most of what I had with a more expensive cable plan. Now. No contract! Only disappointment is how long it takes to connect to WiFi and internet. Likely not just Roku fault.

In under 6 months multiple features of the stick stopped working. The volume control doesn't work. You can no longer fast forward. The remote has never been dropped or mishandled. Horribly made!!!!UPDATE - contacted Roku directly. The remote is still under warranty and they are shipping out a new one.

When using the original Roku Streaming Stick+ provided equipment/cords, I always get an initial low power message  shown above.  Then over a small period of time it cycles and sometimes works and other times continues to fail with low power message. Using from the same wall outlet.  Very disappointed with performance.  Think there is a Roku issue.  Very disappointed.
This was a replacement for a four year old Firestick that had died! It arrived on time, and was e4asy to install. It worked immediately!

This was perfect for what I needed. I have not used the voice control, I'm good with manual search. I have the lite, so no 'volume control' like the reviews want me to mention. I just wanted something for the tv in my bedroom so I could watch things on the 'big screen' instead of my phone. It works wonderful.
Worked exactly as I wanted it to for the room where it was going. Easy to use and set up with a little help was successful
Bought for a bedroom TV so wasn't concerned with having Alexa. Setup was incredibly quick and have had no issues. For the price you won't find a better option. Highly recommended!
The Fire Stick enhanced my picture, but most importantly, got rid of the constant buffering.
I wish it would control tv power,volume have to use tv remote picture quality is great I’m still learning to work the apps, fast forward,rewind  navigating having to find regular tv watching
Very disappointed.  Almost every time we try to use it, there is no audio.  Have to reboot, and if that doesn't work, we have to return to factory settings.  And then start all over.
It's a good Fire Stick for a TV in the alternative room that doesn't need the 4k capability.
Purchased for our daughter's TV easy for her to use no issues works great for smart bulbs and appliances as well
La mejor opción sin duda alguna. Rápido , intuitivo para los q lo tendrán por primera vez .Muy recomendado
I love this feature because i will just think of something out of the blue and Alexa will find it for me
Product does not work well with an a/v receiver.  Every time I turn it on or use Alexa I have to manually reset the input.  Once that is done it works fine.
Use my Firestick daily.  Love the voice feature and ease of use.  Highly recommend Firestick!
I love the speed. Only thing I need help with us moving my installed apps to the main screen.

Audio stops working no matter how many hacks I watch to repair it , I can't get it to turn back on. This is a replacement device because the first one they sent ironically was making a screeching sound and I couldn't get that to stop. Don't waste your money, having an issue once is random but having an issue on the replacement device shows there's problems.

I hate the fact I can't download and watch TV on my Spectrum app.  It is mostly worthless to me just to use it to watch Prime.  I also need the Spectrum app for regular TV.  Won't buy another proprietary Amazon product.
The volume is low when using the fire stick but we got little speakers and that seen to help!
A good firestick for people that don't want to setting up tv controls and are not tech savvy.
Works just fine but I would recommend getting the one that can control the volume of your TV.
I don’t like it because you can’t control the tv with it.  I think that is a different model.
Bought as a family gift and they love it! Opened up a whole new world of choices for older people at home —-easy enough for total nontech people to set up and start using

This product has a built in range extender which solved all the problems I had with Chromecast devices and it is easier to use in every way you can think of.  All you need is an HDMI port on your TV, wifi in the same house, and you will be setup and running with streaming TV in 20 minutes.

I'm a huge Roku fan and this streaming stick is perfect for those "slightly older" TVs that need an external device to stream modern apps. Rather than spending 100's of dollars on a new TV for the spare room, this baby does everything I need. Love it!!!

The product works great, the UI is fast and simple, but the channels(apps) selection outside USA it's very poor. The remote it's amazing. I can't use one of the features that I wanted most, which is listening what you are streaming with headphones in the app of your smartphone, well apparently there is no ROKU app outside USA.

I installed it and watched Frozen, beautiful, another disney movie, beautiful, 3rd day it would never work again. Went to Best buy and bought a different model then the stick and it is finctioning really well for days now. I wasted my money on one from Amazon.Denny

This stick works great.  I have a 4k on the wall tv, so the only drawback is that I have to leave where I am sitting to go to the tv and hit the remote in close proximity to the stick in order to get it to change from the first screen to the library of apps.  That is why I gave it 4 stars, but otherwise I love it.  So I get a little exercise.  So what.

Had an older version of the Roku that worked just fine. However, this one would not connect to my router's signal. Spent an hour with Roku service trying a number of troubleshooting tasks. No Joy. Returned it and replaced it with a Fire Stick which promptly connected to the router.

Why wasn’t aware of this? I can’t believe I’ve been spending $$ on cable these years. Found this and I’m not spending $$ on cable boxes. Ordered another one for my bedroom tv. The living room TV has apps but the picture isn’t that great but with Roku the picture quality is amazing!

Love this. Bought it specifically because we lost our remote to the tv and the buttons on our tv dont work correctly. Very easy to sync to your tv (alot faster then say a cable remote to the tv). Works great and streams great

This ROKU device was extremely easy to install and works great.  Streams with no problem.  An excellent ROKU. This was for my 1080p LED TV and the picture on my TV looks gorgeous.For people with an older (LED) Television, this is the ROKU device to have.
Signal and stream is fine. But remote control is useless as it continuously becomes unsynced from the device. Would be completely useless if not for the app.

This is my 4th Roku (so I guess I really like them). I really love the ease of set-up and use. This one I use in a basement room with fairly dodgy wi-fi. So far, it works great. The only change I would make to the hardware is to ask that the male hdmi end be flexible. I have a tv that the length of the stick blocks it so I need to use a m to f adapter. Would I buy again? Yes.
The Roku tick is AMAZJNGit has the qualities for regular tv and premium channel for FREE.I turned in three of my cable boxes for three ROKU  STICKSbecause cable is getting TOO EXPENSIVE
The streaming stick+ itself is a fantastic device however the remote eats batteries.A set of batteries lasts a week or two if I'm lucky and that is with minimal use.

Great value easy to use gives me access to all the OnDemand websites and programming every once in awhile it will lock up and I will have to return to the main menu but no problems continuing watching the show and it picks up Right where it leaves off.  It will even mirror my iPhone for videos and photos etc Although it is a little glitchy
It almost melted on to the back to my TV it got so hot The roko  Even told me it was getting hot I try to take it off the back of the tv and couldn't touch it was so hot .

Well, if I could find a way to use it I would probably like it. Unfortunately, the Roku site says they would send a free HDMI extender in the booklet. I have tried since I bought it and they are always out of stock. My TV is older, 2007 and the stick won't fit in the back because it is a little cubby area. Why not just include them in the package? Or at least tell people you have to purchase more items to use. I can't even find a small one like they show in the booklet so it is still sitting in the box. Talk about frustrating. Not sure what to do now.

I have had several Rokus but this is the best. It really did boost the wifi and not just for the Roku. My Kindle shows better strength. I know they don't say that it works for other devices but it works for me. An added bonus for me is that I don't have to see the Roku light now that it's in the back.

We purchased the Roku Streaming Stick+ as our first step into a "cable-free" life.  It was a great decision.  We have been extremely pleased with the performance and content availability.  Selected this option as my TV was on a different level from my wifi router and I was concerned about speed and connectivity.  The extended range wifi capability of this unit has proven to be flawless.  We have had zero issues in 3+ months with streaming speed in HD.  Highly recommend this product and will likely buy another one for our 2nd TV.

Worked fine for the first month.  Then the remote control stopped working and nothing would fix it.  I tried all the various instructions to reset it (removing batteries, pressing the reset button, etc.).  Amazon says I can't return it because I'm one day past the 30 day return period, so it was a waste of $40.  Won't order this again.

Quite pleased with its use and functionality!  Prior to Roku, I was on cable.  In my opinion, and the opinion of others, the picture quality is better that it was when using cable for TV!Very happy with purchase!

I run a Plex server on a Synology NAS and was having transcode and bandwidth issues during 4K playback. We finally switched from the SamsungOS native app to the Roku+, this solved both of those problems and also plays DTS audio correctly now. Youtube app also runs quicker on the Roku compared to the native smart TV app. Thanks, Roku.

If I had known how easy this device would make cutting the cable, I’d have done it a really long time ago! This was an easy set up, plus I already have a roku premier that is in my living room, that I got about 10 days before, which made the sign in even easier. I love that the stick can be moved from tv to tv and you can wirelessly connect all your tvs. So glad I tried it!

Bought this for my parents a couple years back as a Christmas gift. They can finally watch 4k content on their TV now. Along with the remote attachment its a fine setup to binge watch their favorite shows. Even hooked them up with some of my streaming plats access.

I really like it and the selection of programs is very good. The only small issue is that they show the same commercials but fortunately they don't show them to often which is great . I would definitely recommend it to anyone  . The set up was a little difficult

It can be unreliable and apps tend to not work well. It is cumbersome to navigate and the voice activated search is not up to par. I also have a 2nd Gen Apple TV and the amazon fire stick. The 2nd Gen Apple TV is so much better than both this stick and the Amazon fire stick. I got this to use with my TV in the study. Next time I will just spend the money and invest in another Apple TV.This Roku stock is so much better than the Amazon fire stick. You also don’t run the risk of having popular apps pulled (YouTube pulled off the fire stick by Google.)

have 3 of these. Love them.faster than firestick as new processors, better wify chip in device, allows me to place my 5 streaming channels  at top so i do not have to hunt for them.  yes i will buy a 4th soon.  really best for the buck.

I bought to replace cable boxes in my house - with the Spectrum App this works GREAT.  And I save $ 7.50 per month rental.  If you have DVR - you can do on the cloud - saving you an additional $12.99 per month.Definitely worth the purchase - and you can stream MANY other channels as well.  Awesome product

Love Roku. Simple interface without the Amazon commercials. Plus it has Vudu which I use frequently. The fire tv  products don't have apps it feels threatened by. It's much quicker than the FireTv products I own. In addition you  don't need to buy a sidecar accessory to control the tv.

Totally love this product. Bought one a year ago and has made accessing app streaming such as Netflix, HBO +, Amazon Prime etc so easy and quick.  Easy to set up. If you get a Roku account, and if you change your channels on one device it also applies to the other device, so only had to customize with one of these. The only thing that didn't work so well was plugging into a usb to power. Worked at first, but then had trouble starting up. Easy fix, just plug the plug provided into a wall outlet, problem fixed. You won't be disappointing.
I had this for less than a month and the remote already broke, and I can’t connect my phone to use as one instead without the remote itself
My friend wanted a fire stick so I purchased this for him I haven't heard that he had a problem.
We got it for our teenage son so he could have something on his television and he really likes it!
Sometimes when I turn on it doesn't have sound. iI have to turn off app and turn back on again.
Underwhelmed,  esp bc it doesn't have working HBOmax or Peacock app/channel.  Works well for other channels.
Great voice control but no provision for volume control. At this price, who cares 😜! The benefits of multichannel entertainment outweigh this minor inconvenience!

First of all we love all the choices of programs we get with the fire stick.  It is almost endless.  So much better than cable.  Remote is easy to use.  Installation was a breeze.  Should have done this long time ago.

Added this gem to the other firesticks in the household for another TV that we had - the nice thing about it was it knew who I was and was able to copy the setup information from other devices in the house.  next to zero configuration once the stick was installed.
Not sure if there is a problem using this with an older tv, but I have tried 2 now, and the picture freezes up but the audio still plays.  Frustrating!
It didn’t work I kept trying to get it to load and it kept going blank .I sent it back this is the second time you sent me this review.It still didn’t work I bought a roku and it works fine

Roku is great specially if you have reliable wifi and if you don't have a smart TV or gaming console to stream your video subscriptions. I did in fact have to buy a wifi range extender in order to not have any lag in streaming because my router is at the back of my house and my roku is in the front of the house in the living room. I have purchased other roku streamers, but I wanted to add this to my collection because it is great for traveling and it's perfect for hotel room TVs. Highly recommend.
Dry good product. Works better than the same type I purchased from Walmart. Maybe the television set is faulty. Yet to perform process of elimination to determine the fault.

This replaces ones cable providers set top boxes and saves you money that can be put to use in other areas.  Great for us as retired and on a fixed income I'm only glad that I did my homework and since I'm retired IT Professional this was a breeze to setup.  It takes some getting used to but well worth the time and the savings!

I've got one of these on each of my TV's. Love it so much better than the fire stick. Easy to navigate and never have connection issues. Only drawback is I wish I could sync up my soundbar for the audio. I don't use my TV speakers so it kinda makes that feature useless.

My Samsung Smart TV needed to be repaired with a certain part.  It would not let me use the internet.  It would have cost about $170 to have the  part & be put in.  Someone suggested just buying a Roku & for $39 dollars I could stream everything I did when my smart/stupid TV was working!

Easy to set up, easy to access, streaming is great!  I would recommend to anyone.  Note, plug into electrical outlet not USB port on TV - it makes a difference.  If all you want is easy streaming, this will do it.  Great picture.

Easy to install and get setup. Only complaint I have is they say it connects to your tv so you won’t have to use your tv remote. But it’s missing an input button to change inputs and there is no mute button on my remote. You can change to the Roku input by pressing the OK button but you can’t change off of it that I have found. Would be nice to customize shortcut buttons but I know those companies pay to get their name there so that will probably never happen.

The remote always lost connection to the Roku which was annoying so we ended up using our phones as a remote with the roku app. The user interface looks great but is very slow compared to the Fire 4K. I would not recommend this product because of those two things when the Amazon Fire 4K is so much better.
I have Xfinity cable and wanted to extend TV to a guest room and a lower level office space. I am able to play live Xfinity plus all the other streaming services. This product is AWESOME.

They don't allow HBO Max app, because they want a cut from HBO's subscription fees. If you get HBO Max on Roku, you won't have access to all of HBO Max's content (like Studio Ghibli's productions such as Totoro or Spirited Away). Apple TV or Xbox allow that. This is because loyal customers like us have made Roku too greedy. Shame on them!
The picture quality for MLB etc is superb.Took a little longer to setup than expected but maybe that was just me.
ROKU is much better. I waited too long to hook the Amazon TV stick up or I would return it.

These new generation remotes are made much cheaper and are very flimsy compared to my 3 previous generation remotes.  The new on screen interface is ok.  I have no interest in the voice recognition functions, so I am very disappointed that the remote creeks every time I press a button on it.

Ive tried for hours now to activate this stupid streaming stick. I have many Rokus, but now, it seems as if the company may be having troubles. They don't answer their phone, they don't answer emails, their chat bot on their website is disabled. With a streaming stick, you are supposed to get a activation link sent to your email, that never comes. I am returning this. Beware- Roku may be going out of business. Don't buy!

Good quality product. Good features, functionality. Cheaper than Apple TV, portable, better user interface than Amazon Fire products. The only noticeable downside is I lost Airplay functionality coming from the Apple TV, and the mirroring functionality on the Roku is sufficiently glitchy that it almost never works for me. Even when it does, I can't stream website videos from a mobile device unless I want to use a questionable 3rd party app/channel offered on Roku's app store. Still though, everything else is really great.

We went from the express which works great, but we were hoping that having the stick would provide better quality and versatility.  The picture quality and streaming ability is good, but the remote loses its connection and forces us to move the TV out to unplug the power from the stick in order to get the remote to work again.  Our other Roku boxes never had a problem with the remotes.  Good Item, but the remotes are not worth it.

I had a Roku in the past and loved it, but this one barely works if it’s power source is the tv. I suggest you do not use the usb option for power. Plus, I have to use my Roku app as a remote. The actual remote only works 50% of the time.

Worked great for about a month. Amazing pic and sound, much better than the other "stick". Statrted dropping the off my wifi, wont reconnect. During movies it will freeze or get stuck on commercials. It reads 86 C/ 186 F. Its going back, not worth trying to watch anymore. Thats nearly a fire hazzard. Really wanted it to work.
It was easy to set up and use but it only lasted 10 months. We were going to send it in for warranty but the freight was half the price of a new Firestick so we replaced it.
this model has a extra long wifi range - and it makes a huge difference.  i highly recommend this version.  Roku in general is very user friendly.

I have 4 ROKU, 2 #3 and 2 Streaming Stiks.  One one the sticks works well, but "one" gives me problem at times where the tv picture get blurry and redish, I unplug it and then it works for a couple of days.  I tried in two different tv's and it is the same.  Cannot return it to replace for another stick, so what is the factory warranty from ROKU in the Streaming Sticks (bought in June 2019)?
works good, good quality streaming, price fair
I gotta say the new fire stick is great. Fast and crisp interface more storage and easy to use.
Overall its really good. Streaming gets stuck very little, Overall I am pleased with the product
Firestick gives you the ability to do whatever you want for viewing anything from movies to sports
I am 86 yrs old. Need help from Amazon to connect to tv. Works great since I connected it.
Great part of the app need to be paid. Pluto is free. Great part of news need subscription or cable.

I  replaced the Firestick I got back in 2015 with this one.  I am using it strictly an old flat screen TV, a Sony Wega 65 from 2005 or so.  The firestick is perfect for these "dumb" TVs.  I was able to locate the remote to the TV on Amazon,  so I went with the Firestick Lite.
We have been using the fire sticks and boxes for years now. It's great not having to pay ridiculous cable prices

The product arrived on time and immediately I realized I had ordered the wrong thing. I don't see the point of owning a firestick with a remote that doesn't control your TV. It was a waste of money. Upon plugging the fire stick up it didn't even work. It resets every 5 Seconds. I've spent two hours being disconnected from customer service just trying to get a refund. I'm very disappointed
My husband wanted the firestick to use with the tv in his office. He obviously is pleased because he now chooses to watch tv there over any other place!
My daughter lives it! She can watch so many shows and so many different apps to choose from.
I'd been using roku for years. Glad I switched to FireTV! My only complaint is I wish it had more gigs.
Although setup and use are easy, I just wish the home screen menu was easier to navigate and see.
Had an old tv in spare room and now our guests have access to all of our streaming services.
I live alone and it was easy to put up.  Instructions were self explanatory.  After set-up just took a few minutes to check all available channels. And i was ready to watch.
works as expected, voice control a nice upgrade from older fire tv stick. Very happy with purchase
It was pretty easy for my husband to set up by himself. I normally the one who has to do it. And there have been no issues we've had it for over a week.
Absolutely love it.  It was easy to install and watching many movies we could not get on our cable stations.  Highly recommend it.

It does not work. It does not connect to any apps and shows the loading screen for each app but never can play a show. When I tried to get Amazon support I was told to unplug it and plug it back in so many times it is actually funny. It’s just a faulty product and Amazon does not care to rectify. A waste of money, try chromecast or roku.

Its a better version of my old fire stick. Faster with the same functionality, the only down side is that the remote cannot control my tv but its not a big deal and it clearly says that on the description.
I love bringing my tv up a level. It was like I bought a new experience for less than $20
Once or twice I have to restart my fire stick because the sound goes out. Contacted Customer service that person did the same thing.
I love FIRESTICK!  I told my daughter about it, and my best friend. They're planning to get them also....😃😁
This item was offered at a great price, and very happy with the performance. Thx Amazon -
Easy set upSmall remote and easy to loseIf you do, there’s an app to download
Easy to install. Streaming very reliable. Includes a lot of free movies and live tv apps.
I love new tech and stuff, and I’m sure this one works just as well as the other generations but the software update sucks, the New Interface is cluttered and everything is all over the place

Should have bought this years ago. Hard to beat for $20. You have to use two remotes so that stinks. I use limited # of apps and this works for that. Voice recognition is great — but doesn’t always work especially when searching on YouTube
This is a great product. It made my tv a smart tv without having to spend all the money. Highly recommend this.
I got this model after already having the lower model first.  It's great but I notice the remote on this model drains the batteries faster than my other Roku remote.

I have an older roku that’s had some trouble w/ positive streaming, but when I got this one, I saw great improvement. Very pleased. Voice thing works okay, but the streaming is awesome & the remote is also great w/ volume control & power button that turns TV off.

The remote quite working after 3 months and it was hard to get a replacement. I just gave up and ordered a new one. The service is fine but using my phone as a remote seem funny to me, it’s like they knew it would fail...

The The ROKU Streaming Stick + works extremely well, easy to connect and setup. I am pleased that the remote has a "mute" button on the side. The quality of the device and remote are good and sturdy and the picture quality produced on my TV is excellent. This is the 6th ROKU device that I own and they have all been great.

the streamer is great (!) but it does has a few problems to take into consideration when picking a streamer:1. No official support for Hebrew or for Israeli channels.2. unique interface (not an android device), so many apps are non-compatible to it.3. additional connection to the electricity is required on many TV sets that have insufficient power outlet from their USB port. (adds wires wondering about the house).4. needs very stable internet connection (tried using hotspot from a number of cell phones and it didn't work.
I like this product cause now i can watch prime videos since i am paying for Prime
We full time RV. And we stream everything! We purchased this Roku so we could stream all our movie/tv channels. Works great! Easy to use too! Easy set up! Love it!
So far so good! The setup was easy and the streaming quality is good. I like that the remote has a few dedicated buttons for the streaming services I happen to watch the most!

I’ve had this since May 2020 in September it has starting losing audio when ever you turn it on. You have to unplug the stick and put it back in and it the audio works again. For $50 you would think it would work longer then 4 months.
Muy práctico la verdad, mi televisor no tiene Netflix, YouTube ni nada y gracias a esta memoria ahora puedo ver todo sin necesidad de comprarme otro televisor más moderno

Having a Roku in addition to a smart TV is a little redundant. The remote control is also buggy at times... The roku itself is plugged in behind the TV and half the time I would have to hold the remote up behind the TV to get it to turn on. Not sure why there needs to be line of sight for this to work.

The original HD streaming stick was already good, but this one is even better is that it can also do 4K videos and streaming. The remote is also better is that it can aim anywhere and still operates the channel.  Funny thing is, it also turns on my TV in the other room.  How powerful is that? Not sure if that's a feature or...anyway, get this thing.  You won't regret it.
This Roku stick is terrible. It keeps losing the internet connection and it constantly freezes and randomly reboots.

Overall, it is a good remote with nice system.  The one big thing is that you have to hit the up arrow hard or twice for it to engage.  I even sent one back and got a replacement.  Both did the same thing.

In my opinion this is leaps and bounds better than the 1st gen Firesticks that I've had for a few years. Not sure how it compares to Apple/Nvidia but there's a significant cost difference between this and those options. So far so good, no choppiness or skipping like the Firestick (unrelated to internet connection). Everything is more fluent and just works, no bugs etc.

I really like this device and the remote is great and simple enough for my non technical wife to use. The only other thing I could ask for is a mute button on the remote. I highly recommend this device.

I am sure that one day the ROKU unit will be good for Australia however as of today...You cannot play local content at all.None of the commercial stations (7,9,10,SBS and ABC) apps can be loaded.Voice control doesn't workNo search function which means you have to look through 100's of channels to find that what you are looking for isn't available.No KayoNo HuluNone of this is the fault of the seller.The parcel was delivered incredibly quickly direct from the USA to Australia (less than a week)Goods arrived in good condition in a padded bag.thanksDamon

Don’t really use voice recognition much.  Like the Roku remote quality and roku menu software.  Own three Roku Streaming Stick +.  Have good quality internet connection, one being in the garage.  Great product.  Also have 3 fire sticks.  Prefer Roku except for side load on firestick for more app selection.

I did a 38 day stay in a hotel for some work training and this Roku worked great. It was very easy to sign in to the hotel internet and the power and volume buttons just worked on the hotel TV without me having to do anything.

Bought this product for the grandparents and their knowledge of using devices like this was very low. They took to the device and navigated without any issues. They now are hooked with the Roku and are glad we saved them hundreds of dollars, because they were considering getting satellite tv.
Awesome price for a Fire Stick!! This is my second one that I purchased. The Lite version works well!
I didnt like how it didnt have volume buttons but its alright. 8/10. I prefer 4k version way better

Ya tenía servicio con roku, pero tengo mucho problema de internet en mi hogar opte por Fire TV stick Lite y al parecer utiliza menos internet ya que ahora puedo utilizarlo y tiene muchas aplicaciones o alternativas para ver. Además no tienes cables ni pegamento sólo una entrada HDM y listo. En verdad lo recomiendo 100%
Bought this to use with my projector, well guess who is enjoying thousands of free contents
Wi fi connection is far superior to that of 1st generation model and I did not need the volume controls so this was a great upgrade and an exceptional value.
Alexa and voice recognition works great!!! All the apps you could ever need at a great price!
Great price why spend extra on a smart tv just buy this and use the extra money to buy a bigger non smart tv.
Love how it supports amazon luna also! No need for an expensive version of fire stick...
Way to go.  great little streamer.  I have probably bought 12 of these for gifts so far!

We are using the Fire Stick Lite to stream TV shows.  Our blu-ray player was not compatible with a couple of apps that we wanted.  For a couple of old people who are not very technical, this actually was easy to figure out and install.  We love it.
Works great to get Comcast cable without paying for a rental box. Note: Must be on the same home network where you have Comcast. Don't think you can access that from a friends house

I had the Roku stick but had to buy a new one because my cat pissed on and ruined the remote. Anyway, I had an issue when starting shows and sometimes mid show, the resolution would drop and things would look fuzzy for a bit. My router is upstairs from my tv. I've had the new Roku + for a week now and have not had the issue once. That alone is worth the extra $$. The voice remote is kind of cool as well and saves some time.
This unit works well but it would not power up from a USB connection so I was forced to use the power adapter. Since the TV is wall mounted this made it impossible to hide all the wires.

This device is not any better than a standard Roku. Did not help internet connection at all. Sitting in the room with the weak signal, my phone is connected to the wifi, but this device will not. Don't waste your money thinking this will help. It won't.

Roku stick seems to work ok. However the remote control IS GARBAGE!!!!!! It can only control your tv.  No soundbar, no av receiver. Bought this to avoid renting another cable box in bedroom. I'll pay Spectrum $200/year so i can turn the volume up without searching for the other remote and go back to Fire TV 4k for streaming.

The wireless range is absolutely terrible. I am less than 30ft from my main router and the signal strength is "good", but that is not good enough. Also, this ROKU stick is like a heat sink when plugged in. It is almost too hot to handle. Returning it and getting rid of my Disney+.
We live rurally and use an antenna. With Roku we can get local city channels and grade B channels without extra cost. I have not tried voice recognition or alexa.

One remote lasted about 3 months, second remote lasted one day. The second remote was used in a spare bedroom. When the main remote failed, i wanted to use the spare and it didn't work either. The stick works fine. Remote is junk.
Batteries need replaced about once per week unless you take them out of the remote each use.

So much better than Amazon Fire Stick/Fire TV; because it doesn't limit what apps you can run it. It doesn't try to force their own programming on you.  Works great with YoutubeTV, VUDU, and Netflix.  4K and HDR works great as well.  Remote is convenient because it will control the volume on your TV or through your amp or sound bar (if using one). It will also turn your whole set up (TV, AMP, Soundbar) on and off.
Product works great but it did take more than several tries before I got it to work. Once it is working works like a charm. Love it

This is provably the 4th fire stick that I’ve had, and this is the worst. I have to restart it a few times a week because videos will play sound, but the picture won’t load. Also, sometimes the picture plays, but there’s no sound. It’s just a pain.
Bought as unit for use on bedroom TV so didn't matter if it was 4k capable. Works fine.
So glad we changed over from Apple TV to the firestick!  Won't be going back!  Love it!
I really like all the movies and tv series's  I can watch and all the games I can play.

Even though I have a 4k tv, I bought a 1080p firestick because to watch 4k shows are horrible, everything is too dark, with the HD firestick everything is bright. I dont like the fact the remote has NO volume control
Bought the basic model for my bedroom, as I'm rarely in there to watch TV and haven't used the voice recognition yet.
Works great just have to use your remote for tv to adjust volume. Other than that it was a great deal.
Works fine as a platform to access your cable alternatives. Includes some interesting content as well.
Sharp cl3ar pictures. Wow if You knew how improved all things TV would do You would buy this Fast
It’s serves its purpose but the streaming quality is noticeably less than our Apple TV.
I'm having trouble with Alexa she don't want to respond the rest of the unit is very good
We love the Fire-stick so much that we needed another one. I do like the new button on the bottom, I can watch videos that are on my IPhone by connecting it to the TV through the remote.
alexa works like a charm, lots of free apps, free movies, tv shows, remote its small elegant and easy to use, and for the price you cant beat it.

I purchase this item for my mother-n-law that has never used a firestick or steam before and she loves it its quick and fast even though its the lite version the only thing I wish it could of added on the lite which would be volume and power and this device would be perfect
Great product and unbelievable price. I wanted another fire stick for a bedroom and purchased this. Works great. Would definitely recommend.
On sale at a steal of a price at $17, I bought 2 to replace the older generation. Perfect!
Does not allow profiles. Not sure if it's defective or meant to be bit have didn't too much time with support and they have given me only the same instructions that I've found on the internet.
Only problem I have is that it locks up once in awhile. Have to reset it and all is good.
Very easy to use. Set up went smoothly. Be aware  the "lite" version is cheaper and does NOT have volume control. Since have to use the other remote anyway, it's not a big deal.
Very different from have a dedicated box....but once you get used to it, all's great. All TV's in my house are Roku activated.....Savings of $32 per month...Would definitely buy again.
