And I missed the amazon return window by 12 hours but they would not honor

Things I love:1. On and off button on remote2. Volume control on remote3. Voice command using microphone on the remoteI have both Roku and Firestick. Roku wins. We couldn't use our FS a lot because of Amazon's squables with other companies, which lead to us not being able to use things like YouTube tv and YouTube. I love my Roku.

Got this for a nice TV that doesn't have wireless. Roku worked right out of the box. No problems with creating a Roku account, no issues connecting to wireless. Steamed Netflix 30 minutes after I opened the box. Everything you need to steam is in this box.

Great! Upgraded my old roku boxes with this and works great. I needed to use an extension cord and put below my TV on table - my connection stuck out from side of TV and didn't look good and was too vulnerable when turning TV.

Very easy to install, modest price. Voice control only calls up applications, not specific items within a application (Ex: Youtube is application, specific video is item within Youtube). Voice control is future for this device....where is it Roku???

At least it is worth the money more so than that junky 3600r prem plus that don't do HDR 4K UHD!!3600 plus doenst work as well as this 1 or the old 3600 stick that had a UHF remote you didn't want to drop cause it would break so damn easy!!!

I bought this for use in the United Arab Emirates.After setting it up, I was able to set up Netflix and YouTube, but nothing else of use.Prime video is not available on Roku here (even though I can access it on my other devices), and the "search channel" option is completely disabled.When I contacted customer service, their last suggestion was to use the decide in the USA tp enjoy its full capabilities.... Sure, I'll just change countries.I should have spent the money on a chromecast or a cheaper android based media player.Can't return it, it'll cost too much to return.
Purchased to replace an old Firestick that was slow and being temperamental.  Working well along with the bonus of the Roku Channel for extra streaming content.

2 stars because the device itself worked and continues to. However, the remote does NOT work after 4 months. Just now, I see other comments pointing out the same thing. Frustrating to have a decent device with a terrible remote.
This was the absolute easiest device I have ever set up.  The directions were very short and to the point.
I have had to reboot it several times already. Unplug completely then start up all over.
Provides options not available on smart tv’s like Sunday NFL Ticket plus a more user friendly user interface.

I bought this not knowing it was tied into Alexa. I went ahead and put it on the television and it works fine. However, we had a little bit of difficulty installing. I need to know if it will continue working without Alexa.
Every time I click the home button the tv input shuts off and I have to keep changing it back and it resets the Amazon fire stick.
I have one for each television in our home.These are always great gifts as well.Highly recommend.
outstanding product... easy to install and to use... i bought several units for all tvs at home
Works like a champ, and you don't have to be a tech wizard to get it going... I love it.

Had nothing but issues with this thing regarding connecting to my YouTube account or connecting via youtube on the firestick with my phone.Honestly would look around before getting this, theres more products out just like this one that are cheaper as well.Don't get this product unless your ok with internet connectivity issues and being in guest mode on youtube.

MY OLDER FIRE STICK WORKS BETTER. THIS ONE LITE ONE WORKED ON MY OLDER NON-SMART TV BETTER THAN MY 4K SMART TV BUT STILL ONLY PERFORMED HALF AS GOOD AS MY OLD ONE. I WILL TRY A 4K ONE NEXT TO SEE HOW IT PERFORMS.

This is my first experience with a device like this. After finding out my older blueray player won't support prime and netflix any longer, I bought the Roku. I am amazed at how much I was missing from trying to use the old blueray. The Roku is very easy to navigate. No extra advertising. No fuss setting it up. In fact, I still switch off to the old player to watch family DVDs and play some favorite cds. Its just that easy! Love it!

I liked this Roku it is saving me lots of Money versus subcribing to Xfinity or Comcast cable! There are a lot of shows to watch including Disney - Star Wars , M, and others  I thought I was spending more by buying a new modem.  androuter and the Roku now two years later I noticed it was a  good decision!!!!!
Love the roku. Picks up wifi from far away. But the remote is annoying. Disconnects from tv a lot and batteries go down quickly. Voice recognition isn't great.

I loved the Roku Streaming Stick at first -- the install was easy, the picture and sound was outstanding. But after about a month it began failing. No picture, no sound. Sometimes it would work, but it progressively got worse. Now it does not work at all and it's too late to return. It went from one of the best purchases I've ever made to one of the worst.

I like the idea of a streaming stick, however the one I received is defective and my window for return was only 30 days. It took that long to get in touch with anyone by email or chat. Support for the ROKU products are nonexistent. The streaming stick overheats, throws errors and has to be unplugged and reset daily and still freezes up.

I don't really know how to rate this Roku because clearly it's defective. I have a Roku 3 and I absolutely love it.  I got a great picture with this and I love the voice remote control however the audio kept cutting out on me so I had to return it.  If not for the audio issue I would say it's fantastic. I'm going to get another one and see what happens and then hopefully  I will be changing my rating to a five, if the audio issues no longer exists.

I currently use Chrome Cast and my PS 3/4 but decided to give Roku a try and purchased a refurbished one which saved me about $10. This has to be the worst refurbished item I have ever received. Right out of the box it is disgustingly dirty and all scratched up. I get that it's not new but one would expect at the very least a cleaned product. I wouldn't even give it away in it's current condition. You've got to wonder about a company that would give a dirty product to customers. I cannot attest to it's functionality as I'm likely going to return it.

So far so good, so much faster and no buffering like my 2017 firestick.I have( 4k) firestick in the bedroom works great. I tried using the $25 off code for firestick this holiday season and it wouldn't let me use it, so went to Roku. Glad I did!

This is my 3rd roku stick, bought the smaller $35 ones previously, but was intrigued with the wireless claim, well it worked great, compared it to my previous ones and it lived up to its claim of extended wi-fi and faster speed.Will buy another and would definitely recommend.

Roku is way better then the Amazon fire stick I love it I bought 2 for my kids room and I was impressed so I decided to replace my fire stick with the Roku streaming in my living room it was the best decision I made I'm very pleased would recommend Roku before the fire stick any day

I bought two of these to replace my expensive cable setup, and I've been very happy with them. Set up was easy and straightforward, and the remote and menus are simple and user-friendly. Being able to watch live TV on PSN and videos on Youtube on the same device is very handy and something that wasn't possible with cable. This is a good low-cost option for cord-cutters.
Attached to TV in spare bedroom to allow visitors to watch in privacy.  Logged on to my WiFi and it was easy set up from there.  Very satisfied with the purchase.
I didn’t realize how well this would work for my application.  Better than I had hoped.  Easy installation, prolonged the life of my old flat screen by several years by increasing streaming ability.

Reason for 4 stars was I got one that proved to be defective.  It kept looping back to Start over and over.  Used website support and after trying all the options, the answer was defective.  Used Amazon's Return and Swap for another.  The second one works fine.  No looping.

Much faster and with a superior interface and remote, I am enjoying promotional offers and actually cancelled my satellite TV. Depends on internet speed of course, but overall great (my provider, Windstream, SUCKS). You will love it too. Lots of free TV, too.

The extended WiFi range is what makes it worth spending the extra money to buy the + version.  Even the cable guy that came to my house for a service call was amazed.  It makes a big difference over the standard stick and I highly recommend it!
Haven't had any problems with voice recognition but sketchy a teeny bit on streaming. Might be location because it works better than the other TV that is streaming straight from cable.
I purchased this unit for one of my flat screens. I love the compact style and ease of use. Streaming is excellent just like my other Roku units. Highly recommend
Roku is the best, in my view. The product shipped quickly. I am pleased with the product and the seller. Four stars because there is always room for improvement.

Had this less than a year and the remote works sometimes and sometimes will not. Disappointed. Cancelling service and getting fire stick should have to start with. Contacted Roku with the issue and wouldn’t help because I bought on amazon not from their site. Not good customer service.
Love the ease of set up, fairly user friendly for me. My kids figured it out instantly!
This is perfect for tvs that don’t have all the streaming apps loaded to them already.

Simple to install and operate. Plenty of apps both free and pay.  Alexa is a great search feature, 5G compatible and reliable.  I recently added Prime and I'm set.  I bought this for a sitting-room with poor reception and no wires.  Very happy and saved some money.
Liked the ease of set-up when travelling and staying in hotels. Relatively inexpensive and has a great picture quality.
Amazon Fire Stick Lite with alexa does what its suppose to works great and like the price
Amazing device if you don’t have a smart tv! Highly recommended easy to setup and use.
Wonderful product. Extremely easy to install and use even for a 60 something year old!

I love fire sticks but this one I received has a couple of bugs. The exit selection on Netflix doesn’t work. I found a work around by going to Get Help and exiting on that menu. Also, the YouTube app freezes. So to watch YouTube I use AppleTV. But with all fire sticks the ease is nice.
My son was asking me for a Chromecast but instead, I decided to try  Fire TV Stick Lite. I do not retreat, my son liked it and it is easy to use. Totally recommended.

I loved my new updated fire stick. Until it would not connect with my wifi. I woke up to watch tv and it will not connect back to my WiFi. It says strong signal but connection error. I tried all the troubleshooting steps and now I can’t even log into the WiFi at all. We have 4 other older models of fire sticks in the house and they are all working.
Strong streaming tool..bought it for my kitchen tv because my old roku kept buffering or dropping the channel altogether.  This new Roku has better reception.

A lot of value for the cost. Small size fits directly to my HDMI port, with an option to get a free HDMI extension from Roku if it doesn’t.A surprising number of free channels (with tolerable Ads) plus the ability to link your premium channels.You may need to upgrade your router - we were good with our ASUS RT-AC68U but check yours.  Also, we are able to stream with a low 3Mb data rate / low end internet service - maybe lucky for us but it consistently works fine.Finally, we were so happy with the first one, we bought a second - and still pleased after 6 months of use.
I could not figure out how to use the volume or pause on the actual fire stick but I did think it was a good buy and was easy enough to set up.

Bought a couiple of these to allow me to drop ATT TV in favor of Philo and Youtube TV.  They work great.  I haven't used the voice recognition features (honestly didn't even know they existed until prompted when writing this review).

We have Dish but my wife's TV is connected via wireless to the Hopper so it wont bring up Netflix. The Roko was the answer since it goes directly online to connect to Netflix. The TV is just set to the HDMI port connected to the Roko and the rest is just following the instruction.
Easy setup great picture and this is my third Roku setup. It took no time at all to connect it and put my information in from Alexa and Boom she was running

Bought this to replace an older model in my basement that would buffer during streaming and was generally not very enjoyable to use.  The extended range on this model seems to have solved the problem.  Works great!  Same familiar, easy to use Roku interface with some features my older model didn't have.

A good system. I've used the Firestick too. I think it boils down to user preference. I liked them both but I'm really pleased with the Roku.I chose this system bcuz I can access my DVR bcuz of the exclusive deal they have with Xfinity

Roku streaming stick + is a great little box for a very decent price.  The only thing to know is that most of what you want to watch costs extra money for subscriptions to hulu, amazon prime, netflix, HBO etc. I guess naively I thought there would be more interesting shows I could watch without paying for additional subscriptions. So I will invest in a few subscriptions, seeing as teh box itself comes with a few things but nothing I really care to watch.  But now at least I can watch TV and shows seeing as I did not have more do i want cable tv.

I have used several Rokus on TVs that don't have the ability to add the YouTube TV app. (It is annoying that Samsung "smart" TVs that are only a couple of years old don't allow this.) I have now cut the cord on Comcast for cable and am saving thousands of dollars a year. It takes a little while to get used to the change but we have not looked back once with regret. I actually like the Roku interface better than the interface on Apple TV and on newer TVs that have YouTube TV already on them. We don't use Roku for much else other than YouTube TV, Netflix and Amazon Prime.

Purchased for my daughter for college dorm room and this little stick is awesome.  Instant ability to connect to all your subscriptions and able to stream in local stations.  She loves it and nice way to take a break from studies especially with strict pandemic rules for students.  Ease of use is fantastic and simplistic.  Easy to set up and remote is intuitive and has nice feel to it.  Would recommend to anyone who does not want to pay for cable/satellite tv.

Hi Product is really fast and quality is also  good.Amazon tried to helpmw with their best product support.Unfortunately  Amazon prime is not working in Roku in my region(MEA Region ) as per my conversation with ROKU customer service.I have bought the same because my cromecast doesn't support the same. Ended up in the same place were i have started.I didn't buy the fire stick as it does not support youtube. The product is cool no lag good response etc but if want to have access to every thing go for another unit.
Great device that brought my 11yr.old TV into the modern age. I needed it to get Disney+ on an old TV in our den to be able to watch Hamilton. Now we're also able to watch many other programs.

The stick works great for me. Many apps to choose from.  Haven't had any issues with connectivity.  Sometimes there's a bit of a electrical, for lack of a better word, tick coming from the tv, but I just disconnect the Roku stick and reconnect it again and it stops.  I'm happy with my purchase.

Have many Roku and a Roku TV. The cheap ones didn't reach the TV in my garage. This one works great out there no problem. Wish it would shut off after being inactive for so long. It stays on even when I'm not using that TV for a couple weeks at a time.

It’s your standard Roku setup. Only took a minute to hook up. I like that I don’t need to connect it to power to work. Unfortunately we have an off brand tv that doesn’t work with the remote, so we still have to use 2 separate remotes, which is annoying. That’s really my only gripe so far.

For the first week I had this item everything was fine. Then all of a sudden it kept dropping from the Internet. I have real strong Wi-Fi and my Wi-Fi modem box is right next to it. When it drops the Wi-Fi it takes a minute it restarts and then it’s frozen and you cannot use it. I would not recommend us it’s a waste of money!

I got this product because my Vizio tv can’t seem to get Disney Plus and the built in Hulu app has basically become dysfunctional. The Roku stick solved both those problems for me, plus offers several additional apps, runs very fast and is overall a very easy device to use. The remote is nice too and I especially love how it can control volume and tv power, which allowed me to put away my original tv remote. Highly recommend this product, especially to those with older smart TVs that have outdated apps or better yet even dumb TVs

I wanted this becauseIt has the volume controls.I can't believe how bad thisIs. Half the time it doesn'twork. The cheap model workedjust fine. It's not worth it at all.Very disappointed. I wouldn'trecommend it.

This is the 4th roku i have purchased. Overall very happy with the quality and streaming. The remote for this last one i bought is very inconsistent. Thought maybe the batteries that come with it were bad, then changed with new ones and it only works sporadically

We purchased Roku as we needed to convert one of the regular Tv’s at home into a smart tv and watch Netflix. It took only fewe minutes to install and connected immediately to wifi connection. We are very happy and satisfied with ROKU. The only reason I don’t give the 5 stars is because the function of voice recognition doesn’t work, but we think it is because the tv is old generation.

I’m not sure if this is user error, or a device error, but the volume doesn’t work 50% of the time on one of our TVs. I constantly have to unplug the fire stick for at least 60 seconds to get it to work again which is frustrating. Never have to do this on the other two TVs so maybe it’s just our tv? Otherwise seems to work nicely.
Should have bought the one with integrated tv control.  Does exactly what it says it does but having a separate remote for on/off and volume is dumb.  My error.
No problem  setting it up, but I didn't realize it would not control on off or volume.
This is so easy to set up.  I had no problems getting it set up and using my Fire TV Stick Lite.
Wish we would have gotten this sooner! Super easy to use, good quality. Can’t beat the value for the price.
This product meets my expectations. I ordered another one because it is a great product.

When it works it is amazing and I love that you can add basically all the apps you need and have everything in a handy place.  However the audio on mine goes out a lot so I have to unplug it and replug it in, which is very annoying.
Audio doesn’t work half the time. Constantly having to reboot or unplug unit from TV to fix.

Love our fire stick. We don't have cable tv and the fire stick is the best option and we arnt looking back. The only small problem we have has is the battery cover on the remote is loose and falls off
Great product for the price, love being able to watch the movies and shows that are available.
WONDERFUL TELEVISION LINEUP!! HOWEVER IT DOESN'T INCLUDE VOLUME CONTROL. OTHER THAN THAT IT'S A GREAT BUY WELL WORTH THE MONEY!!!
Looking at some of the other reviews I was hesitant to buy but glad I did. Set up was super easy had no problems at all. Everything works perfect for the very low price of $17
Easy to setup and works great! Would purchase again and definitely recommend for friends.
All the features work as described. Enjoy streaming from a non smart tv. Excellent value
Our first fire stick lite was replaced after spending 2-3 hours to install. 2nd was sent to replace and it’s just as crappy. I want my money back!!!
I didn’t realize when I purchased this fire stick that it does not have an on and off button or volume control. So I have to use 2 remotes. Annoying
I have a couple firesticks and they all seem very clunky. I have high speed internet and my roku devices are all much better.

Not sure why but have to unplug everytime I turn on my tv. Don't know why it won't connect to my tv so have to get up unplug the plug and plug back in to have it start up.. not what I signed up for with this
Works a little better than the older generation sticks. Really happy with this stick.

Purchased this unit just over a year ago.  It worked fine for about the first 6 months. After that the battery life seemed to be drastically reduced. I now have to change them every Month.  Often the remote wont work at all even with fresh batteries until i remove them and reinstall them.  Very disappointed.

I travel a lot for work and try to go the cord cutting route. I have accounts for most streaming services, but to be able to screen mirror to non-smart tv's is a blessing. Typically I would attach my laptop with an hdmi rendering my pc useless. This helps in so many ways and has made my life so much easier. the user interface is very good and being able to speak into the remote to find something has been working well for me. Love the product.

This replaces a fire stick (2nd generation) to correct wifi connection issues. It works great and has additional free apps that we are enjoying. It does not have an internet app which we use to stream from websites. Also the mute button is on the side so I’m constantly accidentally muting but not a big deal.

There is no headphone jack on the remote like the previous version I miss that. The previous version fit perfectly in your hand I don’t know why they changed it you will really notice a difference if you’re used to the old one

We still a have cable, xfinity, but there is a beta xfinity channel so this takes the place of one of their boxes, saving $10 a month. Works great, voice control works with some channels, good investment
We have a 2016 vizio . Had to connect to the arc hdmi due to the hdcp standards. All but this hdmi are 1.4 and the arc hdmi 1 slot supports the 2.2 newest version. Hope this helps.

I’ve had this roku stick+ for about a week now, and it’s great! The picture quality isn’t superior to my cable channel quality. Super easy/intuitive to use and I like that I can download the roku app/use my phone as the remote. It will initially say the power is too low when plugged into my TV, but in about 30 seconds it’s charged up and ready go. I haven’t had any issues with it going out even when watching a full length movie!
The setup wasn't difficult and the picture quality is spot on! Im going to get another for a room in my basement which doesn't have cable access!KIm

I like it a lot but I don't like the new remote...too many unnecessary buttons (my flat screen TV remote has too many buttons on it, too, so...).  However, the buffering problems I had before are gone, and it was an easy install for a dummy like me, so (all in all) I'm very happy with it.

The Roku Streaming Stick+ is just what I've dreamed of - so long cable boxes.  These are so good I put them on all my TVs.  The ability to power on/off the tv and control volume is terrific.  It even controls one if my old TVs when neither satellite or cable controller could do it.  My biggest complaint is the cost for the plus.  Drop the price and these are the only tv/streaming device you'll use.
I do not use the voice or alexa, but it was easy to set-up. Delivery, etc was on time

We've been slowly replacing our roku devices with amazon fire sticks and loving it. This one in particular is great because we just needed a very simple one to live in our projector (we only really use it for watching sports so don't need it to control the tv/sound/etc). perfect fit.
So much free TV out there, why pay for Cable! ))—>> Pluto TV!!! It’s free ITS FOR ME!
I love it & have watched 5 movies already..just got it 3 wks ago & I don't watch much tv lol
Love the ease of accessing all the tv apps we need and some extra ones that were bonus
The fire stick lite is great. Voice recognition works well. There is no volume control on this one. I use it in my bedroom. Love it.
Love the clean look and options. Wish y'all would come to an agreement with peacock!
I like everything about this Firestick. It is the third one I have. One for each TV.
Easy to down load. No voice volume to control but in can work it.it was easy to down

I did not like that no volume control was offered so that meant I had to tug around the original tv remote as well🙄 Then the cache for the apps will not go back to O once cleaned. What's up with that? Big inconvenience.
It's Perfect! There's really nothing more to say. I have 5 Firesticks and love them!
It installed easy. Works greatControlling fast forward through by voice is great.
Helpful with the kids and adults alike.  Makes tuning in to a program quick and easy
This is honestly one of the best things I have ever bought. I LOVE LOVE LOVE my fire stick! Great volume and voice recognition.
This adds a lot of shows for us to watch that we previously couldn't get on our smart tv.
I love this so much! Best $17 I’ve spent (it was a Black Friday sale). Glad I ditched Roku for this

I got this for my 4 year old daughter and hooked it up to the tv in her bedroom. I love how it's so easy and simple for her to use. She has amazon prime, disney plus, and netflix for apps on her tv. All she does is hit the voice button for what she wants to watch and it comes up easy for her. Also their are games she downloaded for free that she loves to play! Definitely recommend.
Works so much better than my old fire box. Remote is a little finicky butt it works.
I have figured out how to turn tv on and off with control? I’m thinking you probably can’t...
I love my fire stick. I can’t afford a smart tv but this is a great tool. I get ball I need

Love this product! It came a day before than I had expected. The box as well as the product was in perfect condition! I love the remote which works manually and by voice. Also, batteries are included 😊

Everything works great, but the internal microphone arrived broken. The button to bring up the listening part works, but the mic obviously doesn't work. Too bad, because otherwise this is a great item. The volume and power buttons being included on the remote itself are fantastic. Much easier than needing the actual TV remote as well. Aside from the disappointing mic being broken upon arrival, it's a great product.
Got for F1 TV app works great. Amazon Firestick won't run the F1 TV app unless you get the f1 tv apk from the Downloader app and the navigation is horrible.

Im very happy with this product. The imagery is sharp and clear and the content seems to load pretty fast too. I love how the remote can control the tv power and volume so i dont have to use (and keep track of) multiple remotes. Setup was pretty simple and everything switched over from my other gen 1 firestick.

Roku does not charge you for activating the device, no matter how many other Rokus you have. There are fraudulent websites out there that will charge you. Just be sure to go to the legitimate website: roku.com/link
First time I order something like this, nice I can add channels from Roku. Local channels, but delay by a half hour.I purchase this for 37.00 now it is  $43.53. Dam.
My issue is with the remote, drains battery fast & sometimes not responsive.

This is my 3rd Roku it is how we watch tv. I got this one for our living room because of the volume and power for the tv so we only have to use one remote .I love it, the only problem is this bad boy eats batteries about a set every 2 weeks so stock up.. It will pop up on the screen and let you know they are low I put a set out but only change them when they die. Even with that fact I will be getting one for the bedroom.

Just had only the streaming stick but had to make sure the inferred box pointed toward the remote.  This one is hidden and the use of the wifi makes it easier to use as well as it controls some of my TV actions (sound/CC).  Would get this one or try another upgrade if I had more tv's.

I  ordered this when I went to a new residence My old one worked well. I also had the Apple service. At my new  address when I tried to use it, it only got me to the home screen and there it froze.  I called customer service and got a replacement.  Same problem. I give up. I'm getting an Apple stick.

I bought two of these. One of them is working amazing the other the remote keeps not working. I have changed the battery 3 times now. The only thing that works is re-linking the remote everyday, which is a nuisance. You have to take out the batteries and unplug the power to the stick to reset it then reconnect it and put the batteries back into the remote.I do like the streaming application itself. It is very user friendly and easy to personalize. However, I am considering returning it due to the remote issue.
Roku does not work with some Toshiba TV’s and they do not tell you.  I wasted hours trying to make this work. Further, there is no customer service for Roku during COVID.

Wow you make it difficult to complain. Tried logging in to watch a movie. I have done so without "signing in" but this time can't I forgot my password. You may be loosing this customer and a few more ! Your method s stink.....
I get Dolby Digital 5.1 just find from my older Apple TV via HDMI to my TV and optical to my receiver. The Roku will only give me pro-logic. Returned it.

I have one of these on 2 different tv's and the picture goes blurry constantly.  Also, the remotes tend to not work all the time.  Same thing happens on both tv's, which are different manufacturers, so I know it's the Roku.  If it weren't for needing the spectrum app, I would've just stuck with the Firestick.

Love this new Roku!  So easy to setup.  I was using a Roku that my brother gave me, that was approximately 15 years old, but still working.  This one is so fast & easy to use.  It is like having a new TV, the quality of the picture is truly amazing.  I love it!

Love it for the remote only. Don’t notice much difference over my 2016 stick in speed.I like being able to change the volume and turn the TV on and off with the remote. Now add the volume buttons to the top of the remote (don’t like them on the side) along with a channel up/down and source button so I can get rid of my TV remote.
I bought this because I couldn't get the Spectrum TV app on the Amazon Firestick. I like the Firestick, but I like the Roku better. It operates a little more smoothly.

Since im in Latin america i can't speak about the exclusive US content, so far i like the device, i'm having a lot of issues with Netflix app (constant resolution changes, bad image, double image, purple screen) that forces me to restart the Roku, but they seems issues of netflix app that i hope will be resolved with an App update, so far i'll use this product for my business trips.
I am one of the last to ditch cable and move to a device such as Roku.  This devices saves me $100s of dollars each month and it is easy to use.  Highly recommend!
I haven't used the voice activation part but after a few months of consistent streaming things have gone well for this little stick. Def worth the money if you don't want to deal with cable anymore

There are a lot of  free shows Picture is good. I have a 32" TV and it is hard to see the menu, but it could just be me. I've had it for a week and the batteries that came with the remote already died. So have a set of batteries on hand.

This is a significant upgrade from the original. It loads much faster and the remote works much better, (has a tv volume and power buttons too). If you are still using the original roku stick, this upgrade is well worth the price.

Ditched my $160 directv bill this month and went Roku, HBO Now, Sling Orange/Blue - $55 a month and don't miss a thing. The Roku is so easy to set up, add channels, and use - even my technochallenged wife picked it up within minutes and that is saying something there. Love this little item and couldn't recommend it highly enough. So glad I moved to this type of tv service and Roku is excellent.

Wow! I don’t know why I waited so long! Easy set up. Didn’t even need to call tech support. Now have better quality picture. Downloaded app to phone and was able to hook my AirPods to listen to TV. No regrets!
DOES NOT WORK. DO NOT BUY. CANNOT GET PAST THE REMOTE PAIRING SCREEN. ABSOLUTELY NO HELP WITH TROUBLESHOOTING, THEY SAID "SIMPLY RETURN IT FOR  NEW ONE"?!?!?!?  BUYER BEWARE!

I rarely leave reviews, but this device is worthless. Despite showing our network at full strength, it wouldn’t connect to the network. We tried multiple different locations, including right next to the router. Our smart TVs, Apple TV and phones all connect fine. Not this device. Terrible experience.

Love the remote, channels selection, guide organization, unlimited cloud DVR, and price.  Could improve, and probably will, the loading and fast forwarding.  But it works!  I use one for travel to watch my home programs!

Really like the features of this stick. Using it on a Vizio tv and I like that I can turn on and off the tv and control the sound from the remote. I also like that if I press the home button it will switch to the hdmi port without my having to find my tv remote to do so. It immediately gives you the best picture quality your tv can handle. It is also very fast.

It ok at first then started locking up and was unresponsive weekly then daily so I chatted with Roku. It seemed the person was chatting with several of us at the same time due it taking several minutes to get short questions responded to from Roku. Finally the person gave me a link to get a free hdmi extension and stated it would fix my issues, it didn't. Thank you Amazon for having there big sale, I bought another fire stick.
Easy to use and easy to setup. Plug it in and follow the directions. A kid could do it.
Love this product, I have a TV that is not a smart TV and this new product has changed my life now me and my husband are able to enjoy a movie in the room. totally worth it.
I bought them for the bedrooms but I honestly prefer the Firestick 4k but they do the job .
Best buy ever!!! Thank you Amazon!! Easy to use. No volume but that is okay with me.
I hate it. I prefer the other one I believe the 4K. This one doesn’t have the same remote, I personally just hate it

People have been telling me to get a firestick for a while now so I decided to finally get one and try it out. I love it and it makes watching tv and movies so much easier! I set it up with my project so I can watch on the big screen and I really enjoy it. The Alexa feature on it is also great and simplifies the whole process. Its also basically a free alexa too!
Got this to replace an older fire stick and it works much better than the original.
Although it SAYS it will, this device does not support Peacock channel. I only bought this for that reason because the roku doesn’t, either. Now, I’m annoyed.
Fácil de instalar, fácil de configurar.. es mi primer producto de streaming y me ha encantado la experiencia de fire tv
It's alright and does what it's supposed to. I wish I didn't need a HDMI switcher to use it.
Love it.  I thought I may have to upgrade TVs to get full Hulu and YouTubeTV but this saved the day.  I plan to cut cable after a few days trial.  I will get one of these for my other TVs
These are working very well on my other two tv’s.  Screen size is smaller on local channels, but not too bad.  I will try and figure it out.  Ready to give up cable now!!!

We really love roku except for one problem we have fairly often. The remote will just suddenly stop communicating with the roku device (usually when I’m all cuddled on the couch and comfortable!) and we have to go up and unplug and plug in the roku again to get the remote to work. Pretty annoying but everything else has been great.
Stopped working in 2 months. Had to buy another. Starting to get expensive. Originally purchase for $38. Now that I have to replace it $51. I’m pissed
Remote scrolls wildly around, was able to enter WiFi password perfectly, it updated and then all hell broke loose. Entering my email took at least 30 minutes. Returning this pos.
Didnt work! After paying for tech support they recommended returning it and now I missed the return date so I'm stuck with it! If you want it I will give it to you.
I’m buying a second one. It works both all the way across the house from the WiFi router and downstairs in the basement halfway across the house from the router.

This plugged into my 60 inch widescreen Sharp Quattro  TV and works great!  My TV is a Smart TV, but Sharp has not updated the Roku software in years, so there was a lot I was missing.  I plugged this into the HDMI port on the TV, and this stick immediately downloaded an update and now I have all the latest access to Roku channels.

The roku 4K is very easy to setup and comes with several installation options and additions. The battery powered controller is very responsive. There is no lag from the device to the tv. Overall a very solid and seamless user experience

I've owned this Roku streaming PLUS stick for almost two weeks. The picture quality is great. Lots of free stations, movies and TV shows. I'm still learning how to get around, it seems a bit much at times. I officially cut the cord. Bought this streaming stick and a antenna (for local stations).
My little girl is so happy to have a remote that she can find all her cartoons and she loves speaking to Alexa
Easy to install. Simple to use. Offers exactly what we needed at a very fair price.
The Alexa portion of the fire stick did not work. Would not order again

My unit went out and I couldnt get anything. I had another unit without the volume control so I used that at this point. When it was working it was nice. It lasted about 5 months. I still like the Fire stick.
works as described. couldn't be happier with it. should have got it a long time ago
I have a older digital tv But doesn't have WiFi  I just change  my Internet service  that's works off WiFi  So instead of buying a newer tv  I purchase this and works great

Overall it works really well and I’m excited to be able to stream to my tv from different apps! However, sometimes the sound goes out. I know it’s not on my tv because I can switch it back over to Direct TV and hear the shows, then switch it back over to the fire stick and hear nothing. I usually have to turn everything off and try again later.

Why change a good thing? I never understood why companies have a product for a certain way for YEARS then they decide, "hey. Let's add a button that no one is going to use right where the play button used to be!" Also half the time the audio doesn't work and a total reset is required.  I Will be changing to chromecast for sure.
Device works just find for my needs of watching my paid subscriptions on my tv instead of on my computer without having to have a smart tv .  No issues since purchase.
We ordered this in able to get Disney+.  Now we just need to subscribe, it works on all services we are subscribed to.

I like all the streaming services and so far its a great little device. My real only dislike (hate) is the ability not to control the volume on the remote itself. Its extremely frustrating sometimes especially if the remote I have to use to control the volume is know where near me.
This is the second one we bought. Now we have one for the house and one for the camper

It did not work.  I got it to set up but then it would black out.  I’d have to reset it every fifteen minutes.  When I got it to work there was no sound and NO volume control on the clicker.  Being returned as maybe a defect.  I’m sure I’m get the same clicker back with no volume control.  What a tease.  I tried all the troubleshooting instructions too. Bummer.
I have to reset this Firestick EVERY DAY. Unplug and plug back in - just to get sound back. Have avoided all Amazon tech and now I know why. Will be seeking a replacement.

I absolutely love it.. I'm not sure how I was able to watch TV without it!  I really enjoy the voice recognition.. I give Alexa a command & she knows exactly what to do..lol..I would recommend this item to others...actually I already have to 3 other people...😁
we LOVE it! no looking back! we are delighted with all the choices and no strings attached!

I’ve got this, and I already had the google chromecast, and the fire tv stick so far it’s so much better, and if you have an alexa in your room, you don’t even need to use the remote control to turn it on/off the TV. It’s just a bummer that you’re not able to control the volume with alexa or even the Fire stick remote control.

Switched from Roku to firestick, while i like the set up and navigation, The fact that if you pause a show for more than 5 while in HULU or Another streaming app, it brings you back to the home screen and now you have to go back into the app and look for the show you were watching to resume! Very frustrating and time consuming
I liked how is so easy to install the fire stick and many great movies to choose from .i no longer need cable😁👍

I actually like this product way more than I thought I would I got it because of the price but after I tried it I was pleasantly surprised so many shows and channels to watch that you will never look at them all plus the integration with Alexa is easy so I would definitely recommend this product

Picture quality is great. Unfortunately it seems like this version has a glitch that causes the video and audio to fall out of sync frequently. They need to be restarted in order to resolve the issue. I purchased two, and this is happening with both, but isn't happening with other models of Roku that we have.

We set these up when our cable was installed after I move on June 2. One of the three quit working a week ago. We have replaced the batteries, we’ve reinstalled everything and it still will not work. Not sure why this one doesn’t work and the other to do. Disappointed we cannot figure it out. They only last for two months I’m hesitant to buy another one.  Also cannot get the pause or fast forward etc. to work.

My other one worked fine, but having voice control and volume too makes life so much better.  I now want to change out my other two also.  I think it also gets my old house wifii better. Fabulous buy!!

I love the Roku Streaming Stick +.  I had previously been using a Samsung Blu-ray dvd player for streaming until it would no longer support the HULU app.  The Roke is a vast upgrade.  It streams so much faster than my older dvd player.  Also, the image quality is greatly improved as well.  The only thing that I am not sure is that useful is the voice feature, which I think might be better on the Amazon cube.  It only seems to work in very limited context.  But, the price for the Rodu more than makes up for that drawback.
Good Product. Honest Sales. Fast Delivery

I like it when technology outperforms my expectations. I've tried a lesser model of Roku and had a bad experience, but this one is a step in the right direction. It just flat-out performs well for just a little stick. Makes the sucky internet I use seem less sucky (ATT is the worst).

So i ordered this as a gift for my parents, and it wont work. I tried every solution including reset, it comes on, then freezes and goes blank. Cant even set it up. Tried other tvs, power source. Nothing.. Ill stick with Android TV from now on.

Used this with my old 2003 13" Sharp 720p with RGB inputs.  Used a HDMI to RGB convertor to connect to the stick, followed the instructions, and my old dusty Sharp was out of the closet and running again.  Great, and inexpensive way, to give up to date touch to old tech TV.

This is my third set and this one is horrible. I have a hard time with the remote control. Sometimes it works great and sometimes it doesn't. I have changed and reset the remote and the USB and doesn't work. The other ones work really good but I really don't know why this one is bad.

My only dislike is the stick is too long to fit into the HDMI without hitting a another part on the TV so I had to use an HDMI swivel adapter but the way it works is perfect just wish it wasn’t as long.

I like this a lot mainly because it's so easy to stream movies especially from my phone. They really made this user-friendly and easy to setup. My only reason for not giving it a full 5 stars is because sometimes the Roku cuts in and out with the audio because (not exactly sure why yet) but I believe it's because it has trouble trying to adapt to my speakers. Other than that, I would highly recommend this.

Finally gave up on my 2011 Blu-ray player and chose Roku to stream- so happy! Set up took minutes, love the free choices in streaming (PBS options like Finding Your Roots and Downton Abbey) and enjoying Netflix and Hulu subscriptions. Only complaint is no mute button on remote.

Love the Roku streaming stick plus. So many free movies and tv shows. Our streaming is even faster and not loosing a picture while watching tv. The remote has a feature on it where you can push a button and talk into it to access platforms ( Amazon, Netflix ... or movies easily.I highly recommend this stick. No monthly fees either!

So glad we finally pulled the cord of the Satellite. We were skeptical but we have bought an 3 of these.  Between Roku, Netflix, and Hulu we are still saving $85 a month and have so much TV.  Very easy to install and figure out!!

The quality of this  device is top drawer and the variety of channels available is WOW! Just started using it, so when I become morre familiar with its features and content, I will give a follow-up review. (BTW: had a defective 'stick' it was replaced w/o any hassle-that was a big plus!).

This product didn't work due to a faulty remote. Reported it to Roku with whom I spent considerable time troubleshooting the issue. Bought another Roku and everything uploaded/downloaded perfectly. Tried to return item, however, family emergency prevented following up with a return item procedure. So, stuck with a non-working device. Very disappointing.Not the first time I've had quality issues with purchases. Grandson very disappointed in robot purchased a couple years ago, though he didn't tell me right away, so was stuck with that too.
Great streaming device. defiantly better than a fire stick. You get so many free movies and shows. If you're looking to buy a steaming device, you must buy this or the Roku ultra. Very good products

I bought this believing I would be able to use it with my cable service down loading Spectrum app but no wayRoku had the best and simplest but they too no longer offer it. Too bad 👎So that being said I will send it back today.Thanks
There has been an ongoing issue with the remotes.  Roku has been giving customers the run-around for quite awhile.  Check out Roku Community webpage to see posts about this.
This is my first Roku and we really like the free channels and ease of going between apps.  My blu-ray always took FOREVER to load apps

This actually doesn’t stream as well as my old Roku I had on the same TV, but I had to change because some shows wouldn’t stream. I probably will go back to Roku to be honest. I don’t have Alexa, so I can’t rate that.
Fire stick freezes and no sound on tv once a picture appear., very disappointed .How can this problem be fixed?
The fire stick works perfect even away from the house in his man cave hobby shed!
great option for apps, canceled cable 2 years ago now and just use my firestick and antenna
Works great i love the new light version does everything I need for a lower price
If your HDTV has sync feature. You cannot sync this lite fire TV. Get the regular Fire TV Stick which is more expensive if you like to use only one remote control.
Had to buy another one!!! Cause I got one 6 months ago, and it quite on me. Found out its only warranty for 3 months!! I would have known that I would have no bought  it.

This fire stick light and new settings are amazing, I gotta say it's just as fast as my nvidia shield! It has earned its way to hdmi 1..lolI brought it as a present, kept it and gave my cousin the old 4k...he loves it.. 😉
I bought this one for my Father in law and he really like it, and I already have 2 more but different types! Works incredible awesome

A pesar de ser tan pequeña en comparación con algunas tv Box que he tenido, es potente, el reconocimiento de voz es excelente y la integración es excelente. A pesar de ser la "Lite" es potente, me encantó!!
This does not work on my Sony 32 inch. I think it’s a problem with Sony T . V. s. What does work fine is the Amazon fire stick. I should have returned the Roku but neglected to.

The Roku Streaming Stick was nice while it worked. It however has stopped connecting to the internet. No other devices in our house have the same issue. I went through the troubleshooting guide without success. When I try to talk to somebody on the phone they tell me that my device is not available for over the phone support. Terrible support from this company.
Husband loves it. Hooked up easy right to bedroom TV. Great color, Streaming,  apps perfect. No problems. He is a remote man, no complaints so far.

Just upgraded from a previous generation that doesn’t support 4K. I wanted to try this one because when I stream on a Plex server into my basement it will sometimes pause and have to rebuffer.  Netflix works fine in my basement, but on a Plex server when you’re trying to stream 20 megs a second… That’s a different story. I honestly didn’t believe that the suppose it four times more range that they’re busting would be sufficient, but it has worked flawlessly for me, which I am really happy with. I have had zero issues with this device, and I can definitely say the range is much better than the previous generation
Bought for friend who had never heard of ROKU & was paying enormous cable bill.Another happy Roku customer!(I am not affiliated with Roku, just a loyal consumer.)
Smart tvs are great but can't always get the apps you want. Roku with its simple user interface has made it easier to teach older folks how to use.

We love our Roku. The reason I am writing this review is because the remote that came with it no longer works. We have only had it for about 7 months. I have had other remotes that work for years and years. Unfortunately, without a working remote the Roku is worthless. Disappointed that it went bad so quick and not sure why.

Solved the problem created when apps on an otherwise perfectly good smart TV and Blu Ray player are suddenly no longer supported. At least now the apps live on one device which is cheaper to replace should that scenario happen again. The Roku itself works great and has a nice user interface. Haven't used the voice feature however so can't comment on that. Glad I bought it.

Worked for 5 months and then stopped connecting to wifi. Wifi issues started a couple months ago but would usually reconnect after a few hours. My much older Roku Stick still works fine but is much slower. There is an issue with the new sticks that Roku needs to fix. Unless the roku is connected to wifi the remote freezes and mostly will not respond to normal commands. Unfortunately Roku makes the process of receiving a replacement under warranty very difficult and not free. No longer a product I will recommend.

If it's not the remote, it's the device, if it's not the device, it's the remote. Need to unplug and reboot min 3 times a day. And I heard such great things about Roku before buying. When researching how to get internet to our travel trailer that's going to be parked on our side lot, we ran in to many expensive installation options for a new antenna, satellites or various hubs. Works perfectly!  The Roku remote is super easy to use and the setup took less than five minutes.  Would definitely recommend!

I got the Roku because my LG TV does not have the Spectrum App.  I did a visual and audio test with Netflix through Roku  Vs. Netflix App that came installed on my LG tv.Using the Netflix App through the LG content store was at least 20% brighter and sharper.I had plenty of  bandwidth and confirmed my HDMI ports were enabled for UHD/4K.  While UHD and 4K work on the Roku the picture is lacking.

Great product. It has a HDMI extension cable if you need one. Very cool that I can just plug it in and ply in the usb to my TV to power it in lieu of using the usb plug that also is in the box. Very cool.

This device has never worked properly. For whatever reason, the remote will always turn the tv on and off and adjust the volume but will not let me select any other options (most of the time) unless I walk directly up to it a few minutes after it turns on and aim it behind the tv. Once the cursor actually moves once then it works ok when I am in front of and away from the tv.  It is super annoying. I would have returned the item but got it during Christmas and it got overlooked.
the quality is bad ... keeps buffering constantly.  Switched to fire tv and zero problems.  Called their customer service and it is a joke
We use this every day and its never let us down. Always works, excellent wifi connection, no drops or disconnects. Fast easy and reliable!
Love that you can do the private listening with headsets! So handy when watching TV at night or when someone else is trying to sleep, etc.

So incredibly easy to set up. I was also able to download the Spectrum charter app which brought on all my cable channels on to this device. I actually found that I like watching the cable app rather than my actual cable box the menu is more user-friendly.If u have a Charter Spectrum box..... Use this to watch your cable through the app for a different tv without a box

Simple, easy to set up, gets great internet connection. I researched all Roku models and the Streaming Stick Plus is awesome. Hidden behind the TV without ugly wires hanging down, no reception problems so far. Super simple to operate, with the volume & on/off controls on the Roku remote, Love it. Highly recommended!

This has been a great product, suits it's purpose well, the stick, interface and remote have worked really well, the streaming has been interrupted at times, but that might be from my internet connect and not this product. Would recommend.

Bought 2 of them for my Parents Room and for myself! And already have them Setup in the rooms, and they’re are 10 out of 10 for me! Good Quality Picture, High Quality HD Picture and Color!The BEST thing about it is the Quad Core Processor built into the device, Runs 4x faster and captures the WiFi signal stronger than any other streaming device! Very easy to install and setup. No more Cable Boxes or having an extra Remote for volume or turning off the TV! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!

So much easier to use  with arthritic hands ,a control with arrows and buttons to push vs, rings you need to get your  finger in just the correct spot.  love the ROKU screen format easy to navigate. Would recommend. buying it .

it is not great for voice recognition, but otherwise this is a great device.  I had misunderstood from the description that this device extended throughout the house so would work as one Roku for multiple TVs but that is not the case.  It is only for the TV it is plugged into

This little thing works as advertised. I was skeptical, but now I wouldn't choose a different streaming device. I had to use the wall adapter to power the unit because my USB port didn't have enough juice. But that's it!

I am returning. The remote won't pair no matter what I try (turning power supply to stick  off; remove batteries, press paring button on remote). The remote does not appear to have power. I even tried changing the batteries.

Ii just spent 3 hours setting the devices up .. it works great and picks up the wifi signal from far .. however the remote keeps getting disconnected and the device overheats. Not sure this is the best device Roku makes.

Cutting cost on cable and purchased this. It is great! Love all the free apps and the purpose it serves. I honestly wish Roku would just upgrade their remote. The reason for the 4 stars is that the remote sucks! Voice recognition doesn’t work for all apps and there are no numbers. It is difficult to navigate certain apps with no number options. Only complaint. Other than that great purchase!

Only used it for Apple TV+. Both the original roku stick and the replacement had a lot of issues with audio cutting in and out and occasionally video would pause too. My WiFi is fine, all of my other devices stream with no problem. I’ve seen this issue mentioned online about roku sticks as well. Deal breaker!

Thank you Roku for being my scissors as I cut away from my cable provider. The simplicity of this little „thing“ is in one word „amazing „.So now I’m stuck having to buy more units, one for my living room, one for the bedroom, one for the office, the list of great installations goes on.Thanks Roku for simplifying my life and for saving me (literally) hi dress of $$$ by helping me cut the cable.
It was easy to set up but if you want full control of the tv's functions you need to spring for the pricier version or buy another remote.

xmas present.  They love it and it's working great streaming tv from prime.

The Fire stick did not work. I plug it it and you can hear the start up sound and even the  sound but there was nothing shown on the screen. I got an no signal on my tv. This was frustrating. I’ve tried everything thing I possibly know to get this stick to work but it would not respond.

I was going to go back to cable and decided to try the fire stick first.  What a great savings.  I love the free tv, but I also decided to add prime which gives me a lot to watch for a lot less then cable.  Alexa was an added bonus!
I really like this streamer. I got it for HBOMax, but all the other apps work great as well. Loads fast, and the home interface is nice.

great voice recognition,  goes well with Alexa, volume control is wonderful
Thanks for the quick delivery as this is a Christmas gift. My friends love it

this works great for screen mirroring! once set up through wifi one time you can take it where there's no wifi and mirror movies or whatever perfectly through smart view on your phone!! just hold down the home button on the remote and voila tv from my phone wherever!! Very easy to install. Have used it almost everyday since installed. Highly recommended!!

My son recommended that I get this instead of anything else. I kinda  was unsure about until I bought it and tried it out for myself. I was really impressed about it. I was so impressed by it, I bought 2 more for the house.

Buy something that is way more sturdy than this thing!!

While watching Netflix, every time we watch a show, the TV screen will flicker with a broad line flickering across. Cannot return it as we did not keep the box as we trusted Roku brand as we had one before.  Nothing works.  Frustrated.

Could not get Language Selection screen during initial setup. Instructed to press pair button in battery compartment, which did not respond. Replaced remote and same problem. Changed router settings to eliminate interference and went through the same troubleshooting as before, did not work. To add insult to injury, Roku allows you the pleasure of paying shipping costs to return their defective product, which is almost the cost to purchase the defective product.

Worked well for about an hour. I was hoping for a longer product life. After about an hour, it no longer recognizes its own “advanced wireless receiver”, I suppose because of a bad connector or inadequate shielding from interference. I see it’s a common complaint, but no solution offered publicly.

bought it for use in the basement. Normally not the greatest speeds there but stream tv/movies perfectly. The comcast app lets me watch all my channels. I have since bought another one to rotate between some seldom used tvs and just returned 4 digital cable boxes (at 6.95 each these will pay for themselves quickly).
Slow, drops at least once a day. I bought the same version a few years ago and it works very well. That’s the reason I bought a second one for another television. I’m very disappointed.

Amazing streaming device!! I have the fire stick in my bedroom set up on wifi and always had problem with my direct tv now service constantly buffering, i ran speed test on my fire stick and found that I was only getting 5mbps through my wifi (none of my other devices have this issue). I bought this Roku because it had the external wifi set up and my issue has been solved. This new remote rocks too, i can turn my tv on and off and adjust the volume now. couldn't do that with the fire stick so i always had to keep 2 remotes handy. I looked into apple tv and nvidia shield as well and those are awesome too but for the price point and just using it in my room, I feel like this is the best value.

I can't believe it took me so long to switch from roku to firestick! I have found so many shows that I used to love and all kinds of new ones that I cant wait to watch. So easy to set up and navigate through.

we have purchased several of these and once again it did not disappoint.

The same price as at Roku or some other places but I go free shipping due to prime membership and nearly over night shipping so of course that effected things,lol.

This was my first step into “cutting the cord”. Easy to install and setup. My wifi is next to the tv I put this on so no problem with the speed or buffering. I plan to buy a couple more around the house. I’ll update on those when I buy them.

They're making these things better all the time. I dont like that it tried forcing me to enter my credit card during set up but i found a way around it. Otherwise its super responsive and i like that i can control the on and off on my tv with the Roku remote.

I love the new firesticks. Bought 4 at Home Depot one day for all of the rooms that didn’t already have firesticks and I feel like they’re much faster on startup than the original firestick.  Very pleased.

I had high hopes for this product and it was either this or Apple TV.  All works fine when the remote works but it will not stay paired.  Tech support is almost non existent except for chat. Roku is very easy to navigate and is  a very inexpensive device to watch streaming television I recommend it.

I gave this to a senior friend to cut down on her expenses. She loves it because of it’s low cost to operate, and ease of use. Now she watches only what she wants, when she wants, and it saved her budget considerable expense!

works very well  &  has  no new layout screen(Updated Software on it )

It does what they advertise.  I had no issues with it at all. I love it

No negatives. I've owned 3 earlier models of Roku and I'm happy to report that this one is easily the best. First, it was by far the easiest internet- & TV-connected device I've ever set up. Second -- and the reason I upgraded -- it responds very quickly to the remote. Channels open faster. The built-in microphone for searching for shows works well too. Roku, you've hit a home run with this model. Congratulations.
I like my older version fire stick better. But this one works fine. I don't use Alexa.
Easy setup and easy to use. Downloading apps with ease and great picture. Enjoying it.
I Love my fire sticks, don't need anything more then this. Works Great!
Unfortunately are very first fire stick died. But, we are trying again!
Absolutely great and necessary device, which inexpensively makes a dumb TV a smart TV, including access that SmartTV don't have.

I had a first generation fire stick and was having problems with the sound dropping out while watching Netflix. Also all apps were slow to load. This fire stick solved both problems and is working fine. I have not yet used the Alexa feature so I cannot comment on that.
The stick seems to be very similar to other offerings it seems very average
if you use some of the older Apps such as Sling Player this version will not work

This Firestick was to replace an older model we had that just needed updating.  It’s amazingly simple to install—and we’re not tech-Davy people at all!  And the difference in speed and added abilities is amazing!

I have an Apple TV, Google Chromecast, and other streaming devices, but the Roku is hands down the best.Aside from an annoying intermittent loss of mouse clicks, the streaming quality and reliability is great.My Apple TV hangs or is blotchy way more then the Roku. In fact I switched to using the Roku exclusively.If you want to stream your TV, use this.

The strong reviews for the 4K Ultra were not wrong. Everything about the Roku is as advertised and described. It works well; the built-in volume controls and fast access buttons (such as Netflix) save time. I’m happy now after a huge disappointment and loss of purchase cost with the Fire Stick as a result of the fight between Google and Amazon which led to Google killing YouTube on the Fire Stick.
I love our Roku!  We got it for DirectvNOW but it's excellent for other apps such as Netflix, HBO, etc.  The picture quality has been awesome and haven't had any internet connection issues.

This is our third one. I love this one cause it controls the volume of the tv. We have three total. One for our living room and two for the bedrooms. We have a fire stick in my sewing room but the Roku is my favorite
Best streaming device I’ve used. Integrates with Alexa. Remote is simple and intuitive. Offers access to every major streaming service.
It has been amazing to streaming capabilities now! It’s everything we wanted.

Second one has worked fine.  Something was clearly wrong with the first one's antenna or something, because it not staying connected was it's only issue, but it was constant.  Hope no other poor soul gets it without it being refurbished.

Frustrating, difficult to install the streaming stick.Called Roku, tech advised me to send stick back to Amazon, said it was defective.Then Technician from our Senior center came and installed stick. It now works ok.No need to send it back. works great

The Roku Streaming Stick+ was very easy to set up.  It works perfectly, and has a nice small remote that is very easy to learn to use.  I only have a 720p Samsung TV, so can't comment on 4K streaming, but the picture delivered by the Roku is as good as my TV can provide.  A very nice unit at a very reasonable price!
I actually bought this to stream video for an in care entertainment system.  It found its way back in the house and we use it all the time.
I find that Roku streamers work better than any others. You get what you pay for and the best time to buy is Black Friday and Cyber Monday.

I finally gave up on the Roku 4K streaming stick as I have had repetitive remote control pairing issues.  Roku even replaced a unit to try and fix the issue.  It may be my wi fi network modem and I tried everything they told me but I always had to re-pair the remote device everytime I wanted to use it.Will now try the Amazon Fire Stick 4K

I HAD THE BASIC ROKU STICK ON MY BEDROOM TV, AND HAD THE AMAZON FIRESTICK ON THE OTHER BEDROOM AND MY LIVING ROOM. WELL, AFTER MONTHS OF HAVING PROBLEMS IN THE OTHER BEDROOM AND THE LIVING ROOM TVS, (I KEPT BLAMING CONNECTION PROBLEMS AND BUFFERING PROBLEMS ON INTERNET SERVICE) I DECIDED TO GET THE ROKU FOR THE LIVING ROOM AND WE ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT! SO NOW, I NEED ANOTHER ONE FOR MY . BEDROOM. IT IS SOOO EASY TO USE AND TOOK SECONDS TO SET UP, ABSOLUTLY LOVE THE POWER ON, OFF BUTTON, SO NO MORE NEED TO USE THE TV REMOTE TO TURN ON AND OFF THE TV AND CONTROL THE VOLUME.

Sending back. Keep getting pop ups saying device is overheating. Tried USB port on TV and it overheated. Tried using the include power adapter plugged into an outlet and it overheated. Felt very warm to the touch.
Great Christmas gift! I only use the Roku now and cancelled all cable. The roku is perfect for traveling as well. Highly recommend.
Replaced our dying Firestick with this and it's so much faster and easier to use. Definitely would recommend a Roku over Firestick.

I've used an Amazon Firestick for years, and before that a Google Chromecast. I have to reboot the firestick daily because it constantly freezes. I've owned three different models of firestick and they've all needed regular rebooting. I have yet to need to reboot the Roku. It has a great user interface, excellent connectivity, and no streaming issues. Highly recommend!

I have Xfinity. They said works with Xbox, PS4, firestick, all not true! The only device it works with (without renting their box) is the Roku stick. Works great! Make sure to get the Roku stick with tv power on/off and volume control. It’s worth it. Love the stick. It recognized my tv immediately.

The system works fine - great, even! But the remote is agonizing. It was finicky from the beginning, but conveniently outlasted the return period before it went from "occasionally annoying" to "completely worthless." Within four months of purchase, it is totally unresponsive to anything except the power and volume buttons.

I spent months researching when I switched user provider for my TV.  Read many reviews and esp YouTube video one guy made covering all Roku devices. This works just great! No problems installing, everything just fine.
This Lite version works well, I'm glad it's 2.4 and 5Ghz wifi capable.

My first Roku product was an older refurbished stick and the plus+ is vastly improved from that one.  My wife likes it better than the voice remote Comcast model that she was using prior to our purchase.  No problems with WiFi and is intuitive to use. Will purchase another for bedroom TV.

A large improvement over my old Roku. Product arrived even earlier than I expected. Had some difficulty in set up, but attribute that to trying to over think the installation instruction videos are well done. The speed in which it loads is very good. I especially like the volume control feature and off/on control. Voice feature works well although no rival to Alexa..
I enjoy this product as it makes it possible for me to enjoy what I choose instead of what cable would choose or a satellite dish.
We have one on every television in the house! Absolutely love it! Very convenient. So thankful to be able to purchase one because there aren’t any in our local area. So thankful!
Came on time. Works as expected
Super easy to setup. I'm an idiot so this was great. There were so many "free" option that it became a bit annoying. This and an antenna and I'm set.

This stick is junk. It worked barely six months. At first we thought it was the remote that went bad. Roku sent us a new remote. It seemed to work for one day. After that we can’t get the Roku to respond to more than 2 remote button pushes at a time, and there is a ten minute lag before it will accept another one or two button pushes. We can’t use Roku because of this so we’ll just watch through our smart tv and toss the Roku in the trash.

The OS is closed OS and no easy installation of third party apps. The navigation is so confusing and not all apps or VPN is supported. Better buy other Android based streamer like Amazon fire stick and you can install VPN too. People outside US don't buy it. Better go for fire stick.
works great
I am not a tech savvy person and it was easy to hook up and use. Very happy with purchase. NO COMPLAINTS ( :
WorksWell. Does exactly what’s supposed to do. If youWant toStream video get this, don’t worry about the fancy features on the other ones.
Sometimes the sound doesn’t work. When it first happened I  looked up online a and it said to unplug the power and plug it back in. It worked but I do have to do it a couple times a week.
I like that the remote has voice recognition and it is Bluetooth so you don't have to aim it.
Awesome price on a great product !!! Work flawlessly right out of the box !!
Good product, just wish the annual subscription wasn't so expensive.
I keep having to Restart the Fire stick to keep the Volume working!!
got this for my mother-in-law and she can work it without any issues
Products are as described.Work as describedFast shipping

This unit fixed every issue we were having with our old Roku and then some. Love,love, love the volume control on the remote. My only problem, and it's not much to complain about, is that the remote is so lightweight that it's a little tough to handle - feels like it wants to squirt out of my hand. For the price, you can't beat it.
I actually prefer Roku over Amazon for streaming devices. More user friendly and slightly quicker than Firestick, imo. I love it

Overall, I haven't had any issue with it, wifi range although it says it's extended, works as usual but let me clarify that this may relate to my poor internet connection. When it is on range it rarely drops, I haven't seen any freezes, there's a bunch of free channels with good stuff.Additional notes:If you're buying from Mexico don't expect many channels in Spanish, there are a couple but I don't think there are enough to keep you entertained.Si planeas usarlo en México, no esperes muchos canales en español, hay unos cuantos pero no creo que sean suficientes para que valga la pena.

Replaced an older Roku that has been giving us issues. I can see that even though the old one was supposed to be 1080p, this one seems clearer to us. As before very easy to set up, walks you right through. The biggest plus is now I can control my tv power and volume from the Roku remote. And talk about easy set up. It asked a few questions and bam, its working. 2 thumbs up Roku!

I think that rokus are great. I have three of them. The worst part about them is that the remotes are good for a little over a year and then they stopped working for some reason. At least Amazon sells about 99 different replacements. They should last longer than that.

I purchased a Roku TV a few months back and we love it.  I decided to go all in with Roku and buy 2 additional Roku sticks so we can use them around the house.  They work great.  The interface is simple.  WE LOVE PRIVATE LISTENING so you don't have to hear the TV if for example your partner is asleep.

I love this device! I got one for Christmas & loved it so much I bought another for my bedroom TV. It’s so easy to set up & use. The apps on my smart TV would buffer, not load, or just quit on their own. So far I haven’t had any of those problems with my Roku. It starts up quickly without any loading or connection issues (which I always had with my chromecast). I also love that this new model has a Disney+ button on the remote!
These sticks are prone to overheating, to the point where it displays an overheating message. This is with the HDMI extension, so I'm not sure if there are any other solutions to get around this.

Overall this is a good product. I really have no complaints about it. I would definitely recommend it to anyone interested in being able to use streaming services on their TV instead of their phone or other electronic devices.
this stick makes watching internet based programs easy.  Just speak and options show up.  Great for kids too since they can't spell yet.

Love this product, awesome for the money spent. Watch movies as well as episodes on tv
